programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY 5 London
programme.desc: At the ExCeL Arena in London, England on March 23, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Tyrone Spong and Remy Bonjasky as headliner, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 84 Rotterdam
programme.desc: Lightweight Champion Tyjani Beztati will defend his Title against reigning Featherweight Champion Petch in the main event, also featured on the card is a welterweight bout between Jay Overmeer and Jamie Bates, plus a light heavyweight matchup between Nordine Mahieddine and Felipe Micheletti.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E04 GLORY 85 Rotterdam
programme.desc: GLORY 85 will feature the four-man heavyweight tournament featuring two-time tournament finalist Jahfarr Wilnis (33-13-1, 8 KO), Heavyweight newcomer Murat Aygun (33-3-0), Nigerian giant Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (22-2-1), and ‘The Iron Bull’ Enver Sljivar (40-6, 23 KO). A kickboxing legend will also make his return on April 29 as former two-time GLORY champion Murthel Groenhart (69-25-3, 40 KO) challenges current welterweight champion Endy Semeleer (33-1, 17 KO) for the title.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E73 K1 WGP Opening Round Osaka 2006
programme.desc: Final Elimination tournament for the top sixteen Heavyweigh fighters. The winners qualified for the K-1 World GP 2006 Final.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E01 GLORY 5 London
programme.desc: At the ExCeL Arena in London, England on March 23, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Tyrone Spong and Remy Bonjasky as headliner, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 84 Rotterdam
programme.desc: Lightweight Champion Tyjani Beztati will defend his Title against reigning Featherweight Champion Petch in the main event, also featured on the card is a welterweight bout between Jay Overmeer and Jamie Bates, plus a light heavyweight matchup between Nordine Mahieddine and Felipe Micheletti.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 6 Istanbul
programme.desc: GLORY makes it's debut in Turkey with GLORY 6: Istanbul. The main event features a super fight between Gokhan Saki against Daniel Ghiță. The event features 14 more fights with the likes of Joseph Valtellini, Filip Verlinden, Nieky Holzken, and Fabiano Cyclone among others.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E05 GLORY 86 Germany
programme.desc: In the main event, featherweight champ Petch (168-39-3, 27 KO) looks to defend his crown for the sixth time when he welcomes the challenge of local hero Ahmad Chikh Mousa (58-8-1, 28 KO). The co-main event will see a crucial fight between Romania’s Benjamin Adegbuyi (35-8, 20 KO) and Sofian Laïdouni (35-2-1, 17 KO) of France that will decide who will qualify for the GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix in December.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E06 COLLISION 5
programme.desc: The interim-GLORY Heavyweight Title will be up for grabs as top ranked heavyweight contender Antonio Plazibat (22-4, 16 KO) collides with the number two ranked Tariq ‘Cookie’ Osaro (24-2-1, 12 KO) in the main event. These teammates will have to put their friendship aside for one night and go head-to-head for GLORY gold. Also on the card are title fights in the Middleweight, Welterweight and Light Heavyweight divisions.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E02 GLORY 6 Istanbul
programme.desc: GLORY makes it's debut in Turkey with GLORY 6: Istanbul. The main event features a super fight between Gokhan Saki against Daniel Ghiță. The event features 14 more fights with the likes of Joseph Valtellini, Filip Verlinden, Nieky Holzken, and Fabiano Cyclone among others.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E03 GLORY 7 Milan
programme.desc: GLORY 07: Milan at the Mediolanum Forum in Milan, Italy April 20, 2013. This event featured a super fight between Giorgio Petrosyan and Hafid El Boustati as headliner. In co-main event, Murthel Groenhart had to battle with fellow superstar Robin van Roosmalen, this event also featured non-tournament super fight series.

programme.title: K1
programme.sub-title: S01 : E74 K1 WGP Tokyo FINAL 2006
programme.desc: The top 8 Heavyweight kickboxers in the world compete in a 1 day tournament to see who will be crowned World Grand Prix Champion for 2006.

programme.title: GLORY Kickboxing
programme.sub-title: S00 : E07 GLORY 87 Rotterdam
programme.desc: A four-man one-night heavyweight tournament will take centre stage with the winner punching his ticket into the historic end of year GLORY Heavyweight Grand Prix for a chance to win a life-changing $500,000. The four participants are Dutch giant Martin Terpstra (21-5, 11 KO), former light heavyweight title contender Mohamed Amine (29-5, 16 KO), the explosive Bahram Rajabzadeh (62-1, 56 KO), and the bruising power puncher Uku Jürjendal (18-7, 14 KO). A huge international title fight will feature in the co-main event as Tyjani Beztati (24-4, 9 KO) will put his GLORY lightweight championship on the line against Japanese star Kaito Ono (51-6-1, 22 KO).

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: This is heavyweight fighting at its best and bloodiest. Finnish muay thai champion Jarno Nurminen makes his mised martial art debut against Korean judo expert Sag Su Lee. And in one of the sport's best brawls, Roy Nelson goes toe-to-toe with Josh Curran.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Tara LaRosa is a former student of all-world fighter Royce Gracie. She takes on perhaps the only woman who has a fighting chance to put the hurt on her...Amanda Buckner.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Chris Souster is an Attorney by day and a boxing coach by night. He sees the similarities between disputes in the courtroom and fighting in the ring. Today we get a perspective on what his coaching day looks like and the knowledge he shares with his MMA fighters.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Transitioning from a professional ballet dancer to an MMA fighter and coach bring some interesting insights and tricks other athletes might not be aware of. Anthony Ford has a ""method to his madness"" when he trains other fighters.

programme.title: Fight Vault - HK46 - Episode 1
programme.desc: Hard Knocks 46 opens with a rare treat: a ladies pro match between champions in differening disciplines, both looking to make their transition to MMA. Lindsay Garbatt is a former World Champion in Boxing while Valeria Mejia is a Pan-American Champion in Sambo. Following this is the main event of the evening, a challenge for the vacant Bantamweight title between Jesse Arnett and Dimitri Waardenburg! You do not want to miss this!

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.desc: Out of the Cage reveals the private thoughts and emotions of a fight sport athlete, the ambition that drives them and how they are affected when encountering defeat or facing triumph. Featuring Andrew Ross.

programme.title: OUT OF THE CAGE
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 OUT OF THE CAGE

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: This episode features two fighters who appear later in this series on the Emelianenko Vs Lindland PPV bill. Here, get a first look at the undefeated Eddie Alvarez as he fights Derrick Noble. And the hard-punching Amanda Buckner takes on well-rounded brawler Shayna Baszler.

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: Spartan Events is into its third year of running its hugely successful promotion, Shock N Awe. With top match making throughout the fight cards, they have been touted as some of the biggest and toughest fights in the UK. Shock N Awe consistently delivers hard hitting action, also going one step further by adding in the personalities from MC Ricky Wright, Ring Girls Poppy and Alex and as well as the huge UK fight teams!

programme.title: FIGHT VAULT
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 FIGHT VAULT
programme.desc: A well-known name on the Russian MMA circuit, this fight is Martin Malhosyan's first chance at North American exposure. Stopping this dangerous fighter won't be easy, but Mike Patt's devastating submission win from series 1 proves he's ready. Wisniewski's development as a fighter was a family affair, as he and his brother watched tapes of MMA battles then trained in the front yard. Oganov honed his skills in Serbia, while enrolled in the Red Army.

programme.title: DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 DAY IN THE LIFE OF A COACH
programme.desc: Coaches in fight sport are at times an underrated but yet intergral part of an athlete's success. What makes them give up their day, weeks and years to help their fighters be the best in the world? This episode features Vanessa Bellegarde as we delve into the life of a coach.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S03 : E110 Mehek S3 E110
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E63 Jodha Akbar S4 E63
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: Namaste England
programme.desc: Param is besotted with Jasmeet when he watches her dance during a Dussehra celebration. An ambitious Jasmeet wishes to be a jewellery designer, but her father and brother discourage her. They even agree to wed her off to Param, who doesn't want her to work after marriage. Once they get married, Jasmeet tries to coax Param to get UK citizenship even if it means resorting to illegal means. But Param is a man of principles and rejects her ideas. Unknown to him, Jasmeet comes up with a risky plan to fulfill her ambitions.

programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E376 Second Chances S1 E376
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: Jodha Akbar
programme.sub-title: S04 : E68 Jodha Akbar S4 E68
programme.desc: Jodha Akbar is a period drama set in the sixteenth century, focusing on the political marriage between Mughal Emperor Akbar and Rajput Princess Jodha Bai. Initially a marriage of convenience, it evolves into a deep love story that changes the fate of India. The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E28 This is Fate S2 E28
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

The series portrays the era's wars, the complex relationships between the Mughals and Rajputs, and the political dynamics of the royal court. Akbar, raised as a ruthless conqueror, learns the meaning of love and compassion through Jodha, who despises the Mughals for their invasions. Their relationship transforms Akbar from a heartless ruler into the beloved Emperor Akbar, known for his justice and wisdom.

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E29 This is Fate S2 E29
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Trinayani
programme.sub-title: S01 : E377 Trinayani S1 E377
programme.desc: Trinayani is a woman who can see the future. She decides to use her power to make other peoples lives better. How will things turn out for her when people learn about her extraordinary abilities?

programme.title: Guddan
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Guddan S2 E19
programme.desc: Guddan, a cheerful yet clumsy young woman, ends up marrying Akshat Jindal aka AJ, a rich businessman with three sons and daughters-in-law. How will Guddan face the challenges that await her?

programme.title: Undercover Love
programme.sub-title: S01 : E376 Undercover Love S1 E376
programme.desc: Behind the facade of running an NGO for hearing and speech impaired children, the demure Jagadhatri Sanyal is, in reality, a fiery intelligence officer code-named JAS.

programme.title: Gangaaa
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Gangaa S2 E39
programme.desc: Gangaa, a child widow, faces numerous hardships while living in a community of ultra-conservative people. However, with a blend of charm and bravery, she challenges outdated traditions.

programme.title: Mehek
programme.sub-title: S03 : E116 Mehek S3 E116
programme.desc: Zindagi Ki Mehek is an Indian television drama series that aired from 2016 to 2018. The story revolves around Mehek Sharma, a talented cook from a middle-class family, and Shaurya Khanna, a wealthy and arrogant restaurateur. Their paths cross when Mehek participates in a cooking competition that Shaurya is judging. Despite their contrasting personalities and initial conflicts, they fall in love and face numerous challenges together, including family opposition and personal vendettas. The show blends themes of love, family, and ambition with a strong emphasis on culinary arts.

programme.title: Maitree
programme.sub-title: S01 : E131 Maitree: The Rules of Love S1 E131
programme.desc: The lives of three friends, Nandini, Maitree and Ashish get inexplicably intertwined when an accident brings unexpected changes in their lives.

programme.title: King of Hearts
programme.sub-title: S01 : E377 King of Hearts S1 E377
programme.desc: Jamai Raja is an Indian drama series about Siddharth, who marries Roshni to mend her strained relationship with her mother, Durga Devi Patel. The show explores the complexities of family dynamics, love, and duty as Siddharth navigates various challenges to unite his new family.

programme.title: Second Chances
programme.sub-title: S01 : E377 Second Chances S1 E377
programme.desc: Yash, a rich and esteemed business tycoon, yearns for real love. While he falls in love with Neha, the journey ahead is not going to be an easy one for him. Will he be able to win Nehas heart?

programme.title: This is Fate
programme.sub-title: S02 : E30 This is Fate S2 E30
programme.desc: The story revolves around the two sisters of Pragya, from Kumkum Bhagya. Her sisters are Preeta and Shristhi who discover the existence of their mother Sarla and sister Pragya, after their father’s death. The sisters try to unite with their mother and sister.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E160 Road Stars
programme.desc: The Silvretta Hochalpenstrasse in Austria is the ideal playground for the lightweight power packs Lotus Elise and Roding Roadster. Also: the elegant but still very powerful Porsche 911 Targa 4S.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E106 Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E151 Power Packs With Space
programme.desc: Jaguar's supercharged V8 XF RS Sportbreak, the Porsche Panamera Turbo S and the Audi S8 combine space and comfort with the performance of a sports car. We compare these three contenders.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Porsche Special
programme.desc: Porsche is a world-famous brand and a household name when it comes to sports cars. For over 70 years fans have been attracted to Porsche automobiles. But when was the big rise of the brand and when was their first car created?

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E66 Space Savers
programme.desc: The Volkswagen Samba transforms from pack mule into high-priced classic. And: a former letter box with 37 seats. The 1962 'Graf and Stift' post bus now takes tourists to their hotel.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Changing the model
programme.desc: BMW got into the electric mobility business with their ActiveE and i3 models. We visited the company's technology office in Silicon Valley. Also: the Stuck brothers at the test track with the Mercedes C 63 AMG. And: the Audi A3 Sportback.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E52 The big journey
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG E63 S is a wolf in sheep's clothing. This station wagon has more power than the Nissan GTR 'Godzilla'. Also: the Porsche Panamera GTS feels at home on the motorway and on the race track. And: Audi's powerful all-purpose executive car RS6.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Pikes Peak
programme.desc: The Pikes Peak Hill Climb is a rather unique type of car race in the mountains of Colorado, USA. It's exciting, tough and dangerous, and in 1987, two-time world rally champion Walter Roehrl took his Audi Sport Quattro S1 to the top.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Rally Sport 1983
programme.desc: In 1983 Audi introduced the Quattro 4x4 drive to the rally world, adding a new dimension to rally racing. The races became tougher and more brutal. The strain on drivers, vehicles and mechanics alike was extremely intense.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E38 Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 British Sportscar Rarities
programme.desc: In the early 20th century people used to travel in vehicles like the Morgan Threewheeler, a mixture between motorcycle and car, thus avoiding the British tax on cars. We got hold of a 1936 Morgan Threewheeler and went for a ride.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Le Mans 1952
programme.desc: The year 1952 saw several premieres at the legendary 24-hour endurance race of Le Mans. After 22 years Mercedes-Benz returned to the famous circuit, and Ferrari started to use factory works team cars for the first time.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 German Touring Car Championship 1992
programme.desc: The Deutsche Tourenwagen Meisterschaft was one of the most important racing series in German motorsports. It was difficult, tough and well-known for its die-hard battles between the international competitors. We present the highlights of the 1992 race.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Ferruccio Lamborghini
programme.desc: In 1964, Ferruccio Lamborghini set himself the goal to build the best sports cars in the world, a bold move, being located only a few kilometers from Ferrari.

programme.title: Motorheads
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Walter Röhrl
programme.desc: One cannot talk about rally sports without mentioning the name Walter Röhrl. From an early age, Röhrl showed his talent in rally sports and won the European, World and other international rally championships several times in his career.

programme.title: Classic Races
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Audi Quattro - Triumph of an Idea, 1980
programme.desc: With the launch of the four-wheel drive 4WD in 1980, Audi changed the rally world. The company's advanced engineering not only improved the handling of the rally cars, but also confronted the drivers with new challenges.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Amphicar 770
programme.desc: The Amphicar 770 is a rare classic and a unique vehicle. It may not be the fastest car on the street, but it’s ready to be used on the water as well and drives like a motorboat.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 MG TC
programme.desc: The MG TC is a sporty, but also extremely spartan car with technology from the late 1940s. We accompanied the owner of a MG TC on his way to pass the TÜV, the German technical certification test.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E62 Auction Classics
programme.desc: Nowadays the gull-winged classic DeLorean is an automotive investment. Also: 100 dream cars under the hammer at a classic car auction in Switzerland. And: modern classics with investment potential like the Mercedes 190E 2.3 16V.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E109 Hot Supercars
programme.desc: Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Porsche 918 Spyder, Bentley Mulsanne, Audi R8 V10 or Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Super Vitesse. These cars aren't really comparable as each vehicle is unique in its elegance and performance.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E106 Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 The Ten Slowest Cars
programme.desc: Cars are often defined by their speed, but we chose to decelerate things and take a look at our top 10 selection of the most sluggish cars.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 The Most Affordable Hybrid Models
programme.desc: If you are interested in hybrid technology and electric mobility and can't afford a Bentley or Rolls-Royce, this top 10 list is for you. We present our selection of affordable hybrid models.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Ford Mustang vs Chevy Corvette
programme.desc: Car lovers from the Middle East present their vehicles at the Sofitel Dubai Jumeirah Beach. There is a weekend at the hotel to be won. A Ford Mustang and a limited edition Chevrolet Corvette are up for judging this time.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E97 British Car Empire
programme.desc: The McLaren MP4-12C isn't just a high-performance sports car, it can also be used as an everyday car - for those who can afford it. In addition: a Rolls Royce Silver Cloud that is covered with Swarowski crystals. Also: the Jaguar XFR and Lotus Evora S.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E95 AC Schnitzer ACS5
programme.desc: Car tuner AC Schnitzer presents its ACS5 Sport model based on the BMW M5. Also: Audi's R8 models Coupe, Spyder and V10 Plus. And: a comparison between four super sports cars.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Episode 10
programme.desc: Christian Menzel asked our presenter Miriam to participate in a driver safety training where he showed tips and tricks on what to do in emergency situations.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Episode 17
programme.desc: The RCN Challenge is the ultimate BMW driving experience. We also paid a visit to the Devils Diner, the track's indoor meeting place for drivers.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Salto Mortale
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes face a new mission: performing a front-flip through the air with a stuntman behind the wheel of an estate wagon. Stuntmen Daniel and Lars display a brilliant fight choreography in some spectacular driving scenes.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 The Flying Quad
programme.desc: Action Concept wreck more than 100 cars each year for their stunts. In this episode, a quad rider is chased by a car. The car is crashed in the process and the quad bike also has to be destroyed, but the question is how?

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Mercedes SLS vs Audi R8
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi once again invite the owners of the most extraordinary cars to Dubai, where they award points for speed, style and sound. This time, they will be joined by a limited edition Mercedes SLS and an Audi R8.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E203 Performance-SUVs
programme.desc: With its Macan Turbo, Porsche sets the benchmark in the SUV segment. The optional performance package increases the output from 400 to 440 HP. A serious competitor bears the Maserati brand. With the Levante, die Italian carmaker wants to stir up the competitive market for sporty SUVs.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E151 Power Packs With Space
programme.desc: Jaguar's supercharged V8 XF RS Sportbreak, the Porsche Panamera Turbo S and the Audi S8 combine space and comfort with the performance of a sports car. We compare these three contenders.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E79 Classic Technology Carriers
programme.desc: We followed the restoration of the unique Bayer K67 research vehicle, the first all-plastic car in the world, developed in 1967 by the pharmaceutical giant Bayer.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E78 Iconic Racing Classics
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type or the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A sumptuously restored 300 SL will start at the most famous classic car rally in the world, the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E29 Diesel Engines
programme.desc: It's all about Diesel this time. We compared the BMW 120d and the 125i. In addition: Audi's diesel-hybrid model R18 e-tron quattro dominated the endurance race in Le Mans. And: the diesel-powered Jaguar XF Sport Brake.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E96 Red Bull Show Run
programme.desc: Red Bull takes a Formula One car on a city tour to promote the New Jersey Grand Prix. Also: Bentley proves that a V8 engine can also set elegant accents. And: McLaren presents the MP4-12 C Spider.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E81 Porsche Cayman R
programme.desc: Not only Porsche fans will like the sportiest Cayman model. Also: with the Juke-R, Nissan combined a GT-R sports car and a crossover. And: the BMW G-Power is the fastest station wagon on this planet.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Graduate
programme.desc: A vehicle jumps at full speed over four cars, which explode one after the other. It’s a matter of precision and timing for the Stunt Heroes. Also, up-and-coming stuntwoman Tina has to prove her skills.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Very First Time
programme.desc: The team is shooting a car rollover. Stunt coordinator Carl wants to go all out. He adds an exciting shootout to the mix. Also, he has a surprise for his boss. During the rollover he wants him to sit in the passenger seat, for the very first time.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Episode 19
programme.desc: The roaring sounds of engines and exhausts usually dominate the Nuerburgring, but we focused on something a bit quieter this time. How about taking part in a 15 mile bike ride around the ring, or perhaps a 16 mile run?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E193 Open Air Feeling
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG C43 was supposed to act as the entry-level model to the brand's cabriolet world. With the 718 Boxster, Porsche offers a convertible at a competitive price as well.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E109 Hot Supercars
programme.desc: Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Porsche 918 Spyder, Bentley Mulsanne, Audi R8 V10 or Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Super Vitesse. These cars aren't really comparable as each vehicle is unique in its elegance and performance.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E84 Kelleners KS1 RS
programme.desc: The BMW One M Coupe from the former race-driver Ralf Kelleners: the KS1 RS is one of the highlights in 2012. Also: another big score from Porsche, the beautiful 911 cabriolet. And: the Bentley Continental GT V8 is a dream car.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E29 Enduro Park Hechlingen
programme.desc: The BMW Enduro Park Hechlingen in Bavaria offers off-road driving pleasure both for beginners and pros alike on 26 hectares. We take a look at what this exciting place has to offer for enduro enthusiasts. Also: what does the inexpensive Hyosung ST 700 i from South Korea have to offer? And: the big-wheeled scooter from Taiwan, the Kymco People GT 300i.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Triumph Thunderbird
programme.desc: The parallel twin-cylinder Triumph Thunderbird. Is the powerful 1.6 litre bike able to gain a foothold outside of the British Isles? Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Episode 19
programme.desc: The roaring sounds of engines and exhausts usually dominate the Nuerburgring, but we focused on something a bit quieter this time. How about taking part in a 15 mile bike ride around the ring, or perhaps a 16 mile run?

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Episode 14
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is usually regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24-hour race. For the top teams and best drivers it is the last opportunity for a really thorough test.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E38 Scrapyard Gold
programme.desc: It is not too unusual to find hidden gems of automotive history in a perfect condition in barns or scrap yards. Also: the MGC GT Sebring, that was built for the 12 Hours of Sebring race.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E71 Mobility in Eastern Europe
programme.desc: In the 1950s, companies like Tatra from Czechoslovakia introduced advanced, even pioneering automobiles. The clientele was exclusive, which is why now these streamlined cars are big rarities. We tracked down the owner of a 1937 Tatra T87.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E51 Open Air Concert
programme.desc: As an homage to driving top-down we took a look at three of the most beautiful convertibles. The animalistic sound of the Audi S3 convertible's 4-cylinder is astonishing. But what about the Nissan 370 Z Roadster? Or Porsche's Boxster GTS?

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Topless on the road
programme.desc: Convertibles suggest to the feeling of freedom while driving a car. We took a look at what Opel's Cascada and Adam convertible models had to offer. Also: what does the BMW 3 series Gran Turismo have in common with its bigger brother from the 5 series?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E124 Special: 24h of Le Mans - Track Days
programme.desc: Two weeks before the start of the 24 hours of Le Mans, all teams are busy testing their cars on the traditional long distance track in France. Bad weather, accidents and a lot of tension, we documented the official test days in 2013.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E190 V8 Power
programme.desc: We took a look at Mercedes-Benz's first convertible model in their S-class. Also: for the Chevrolet Camaro's 50th anniversary in 2016 the brand released the sixth generation of their classic. And: a mountain cruise with the Corvette C7 convertible.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Episode 16
programme.desc: In this episode we invite you to witness the progress of driver Uwe Nittle as he got ready for qualifying at the Truck Grand Prix.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Chevy Camaro vs Mercedes SLS AMG
programme.desc: Mylene Gomera and Saif Hattawi invite car freaks from the Middle East to show off their souped-up vehicles on the "Walk" at Jumeirah Beach in Dubai. In this episode, a Chevrolet Camaro competes against a Mercedes SLS AMG.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 BMW X5 vs Mercedes SLK 230
programme.desc: If you like souped-up and luxuriously equipped vehicles, Jumeirah Beach in Dubai is the place to be. There, the cars are judged and there is also something to win. This episode features a BMW X5 and a Mercedes SLK 230.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E160 Road Stars
programme.desc: The Silvretta Hochalpenstrasse in Austria is the ideal playground for the lightweight power packs Lotus Elise and Roding Roadster. Also: the elegant but still very powerful Porsche 911 Targa 4S.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E106 Porsche to the Max
programme.desc: The Techart Grand GT by Porsche's house tuner is a souped-up Panamera. But the off-the-shelf GTS model also has its treats. Patrick Simon took this monster to the track. In addition: Ruf's anniversary model RT 35. And: the 911 Carrera 4.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 BMW X6M vs Nissan Patrol
programme.desc: At Jumeirah Beach in Dubai, car owners can have their souped-up vehicles judged in three categories and win an overnight stay at the Sofitel Hotel. This time, a BMW X6M, a Ford F250 and a Nissan Patrol are in the running.

programme.title: Put Your Car On TV
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Nova SS vs Honda Accord
programme.desc: On Put Your Car On TV, car fans from the Middle East can have their darlings rated in terms of speed, style and sound. Included this time: a Nova SS, a special Honda Accord and a car clad in crystals.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Episode 12
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Porsche Special
programme.desc: Porsche is a world-famous brand and a household name when it comes to sports cars. For over 70 years fans have been attracted to Porsche automobiles. But when was the big rise of the brand and when was their first car created?

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 British Sportscar Rarities
programme.desc: In the early 20th century people used to travel in vehicles like the Morgan Threewheeler, a mixture between motorcycle and car, thus avoiding the British tax on cars. We got hold of a 1936 Morgan Threewheeler and went for a ride.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E77 Convertibles for a Country Outing
programme.desc: The BMW 507 Roadster was cherished by superstars like Elvis Presley. Today, the 150 HP sports car from 1955 is one of the most valuable classics of all time. Also: following the footsteps of the iconic Porsche brand in a 356 Cabrio.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Class reunion
programme.desc: We started a rather unusual race between an S-train and an Audi S3. Also: some of the highlights of the Shanghai Auto Show. And: Mercedes-Benz invested a lot of money in the facelift of their E-Class in order to put their competitors in place.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Bella Italia
programme.desc: In this episode, our reporter Verena steers a Piaggio Ape through the streets of Verona, race driver Patrick Simon tries to master the Lamborghini Gallardo and we explore some rules of Italian traffic law when it comes to drinking and driving.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E39 Real Winners
programme.desc: When BMW released the X6 in 2008, many people doubted that this concept would be successful. We took a look at the second generation of this model in the M50d version. Also: test driving the best-selling Opel Mokka. And: the Mercedes GLE Coupe.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Fascination offroad
programme.desc: We test drove the Rallye Defender and examined how a Jeep Wrangler with only few modifications can double in price. Also: how does the Fiat Panda 4x4 fare in Iceland? Also: Land Rover's Bowler Defender and Volvo's 6-wheeler, the Laplander.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E30 Triumph Thunderbird
programme.desc: The parallel twin-cylinder Triumph Thunderbird. Is the powerful 1.6 litre bike able to gain a foothold outside of the British Isles? Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Motorcycles
programme.sub-title: S01 : E31 BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: Stunt world champion Chris Pfeiffer test drives the BMW F 800 R and explains why he is rather excited about the performance and handling of this robust and agile roadster. Also: a look behind the scenes of German helmet manufacturer Schuberth Helme's testing and development procedures. And: German actor Jürgen Vogel puts his new Ducati 1198 SP to the test at the Nürburgring.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E183 Speedy Status Symbols
programme.desc: The Bentley Continental GT Speed is a coupe with an enormous driving performance. Also: the Aston Martin Rapide S is a stylistically confident Gran coupe. And: the Jaguar XJR, more of a sports car than a luxury sedan.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E109 Hot Supercars
programme.desc: Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Porsche 918 Spyder, Bentley Mulsanne, Audi R8 V10 or Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Super Vitesse. These cars aren't really comparable as each vehicle is unique in its elegance and performance.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Episode 11
programme.desc: Spring finally melted away the snow on the track and racing life returned to the Nuerburgring. Drivers with gasoline in their veins started chasing their cars around the ring again.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Episode 17
programme.desc: The RCN Challenge is the ultimate BMW driving experience. We also paid a visit to the Devils Diner, the track's indoor meeting place for drivers.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E75 Porsche Carrera World Cup
programme.desc: In June 2011 motor sports enthusiasts from all around the world eagerly awaited the start of the Porsche Carrera World Cup at the infamous Nürburgring Nordschleife. We show you some of the most exciting moments of this event.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E77 Audi R8 GT vs. Jaguar XKR
programme.desc: The ultimate competition: Aston Martin Virage vs. Jaguar XKR vs. Audi's R8 GT vs. Mercedes SLS. Also: Artega claims that their GT is a 'Porsche killer'. Is that so? And: Formula One champion Sebastian Vettel takes the Infinity FX50 to the test.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E48 Most Popular Offroaders
programme.desc: Skoda is one of the most successful brands in the VW Group. The Skoda Yeti has been updated and launched in two model variants. Also: two other popular off-roaders, the Audi A6 Allroad Quattro and the BMW X1.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Steinbeisser Trophy
programme.desc: The Steinbeisser Trophy is the toughest off-road race in Europe. In its 16th year, about 50 teams raced the 8-hectare Off-Road Park Langenaltheim near Nuremberg in Germany as quickly and accident-free as possible.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.sub-title: S01 : E34 Power Offroader
programme.desc: The Porsche Cayenne Turbo and the Range Rover Supercharged are powerful and luxurious offroaders. We put these high-performance SUVs to the off-road test. Also: the Brabus B 63 S 700 Wide-Star is in fact a souped-up Mercedes GL 63 AMG.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E79 Classic Technology Carriers
programme.desc: We followed the restoration of the unique Bayer K67 research vehicle, the first all-plastic car in the world, developed in 1967 by the pharmaceutical giant Bayer.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E78 Iconic Racing Classics
programme.desc: Cars like the Ford GT 40, the Jaguar D-Type or the Mercedes 300 SL wrote history on the race track and now break records at auctions. A sumptuously restored 300 SL will start at the most famous classic car rally in the world, the Mille Miglia.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Cruising
programme.desc: We explored how the Z4 Roadster feels as a cabriolet. Also: the small company Boom Trikes Automotive have become Europe's leading trike manufacturer. And: cruising through Los Angeles in a Volkswagen Beetle convertible.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E29 Diesel Engines
programme.desc: It's all about Diesel this time. We compared the BMW 120d and the 125i. In addition: Audi's diesel-hybrid model R18 e-tron quattro dominated the endurance race in Le Mans. And: the diesel-powered Jaguar XF Sport Brake.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E96 Red Bull Show Run
programme.desc: Red Bull takes a Formula One car on a city tour to promote the New Jersey Grand Prix. Also: Bentley proves that a V8 engine can also set elegant accents. And: McLaren presents the MP4-12 C Spider.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E81 Porsche Cayman R
programme.desc: Not only Porsche fans will like the sportiest Cayman model. Also: with the Juke-R, Nissan combined a GT-R sports car and a crossover. And: the BMW G-Power is the fastest station wagon on this planet.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Graduate
programme.desc: A vehicle jumps at full speed over four cars, which explode one after the other. It’s a matter of precision and timing for the Stunt Heroes. Also, up-and-coming stuntwoman Tina has to prove her skills.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 The Very First Time
programme.desc: The team is shooting a car rollover. Stunt coordinator Carl wants to go all out. He adds an exciting shootout to the mix. Also, he has a surprise for his boss. During the rollover he wants him to sit in the passenger seat, for the very first time.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Episode 15
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Episode 19
programme.desc: The roaring sounds of engines and exhausts usually dominate the Nuerburgring, but we focused on something a bit quieter this time. How about taking part in a 15 mile bike ride around the ring, or perhaps a 16 mile run?

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E193 Open Air Feeling
programme.desc: The Mercedes-AMG C43 was supposed to act as the entry-level model to the brand's cabriolet world. With the 718 Boxster, Porsche offers a convertible at a competitive price as well.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E109 Hot Supercars
programme.desc: Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Porsche 918 Spyder, Bentley Mulsanne, Audi R8 V10 or Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Super Vitesse. These cars aren't really comparable as each vehicle is unique in its elegance and performance.

Also: Harley-Davidson's black chopper Sportster 883 Iron, a starter bike for purists. And: Bike & Music, a spectacle for motorbike and stunt enthusiasts at Europe's biggest motorway rest area in Geiselwind, Germany.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Episode 19
programme.desc: The roaring sounds of engines and exhausts usually dominate the Nuerburgring, but we focused on something a bit quieter this time. How about taking part in a 15 mile bike ride around the ring, or perhaps a 16 mile run?

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.sub-title: S01 : E14 Episode 14
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is usually regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24-hour race. For the top teams and best drivers it is the last opportunity for a really thorough test.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E76 50 years of Opel KAD
programme.desc: The year 1964 marked Opel's foray into the upper class market. The company presented its KAD series with the Kapitän, Admiral and Diplomat models, combining US design with solid German technology.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 The Most Exciting Classic Car Races
programme.desc: Exciting GT sports cars from the 1960s, the pre-war Silver Arrows, hot classic cars on ice and historic Formula 1 cars. We present the most exciting classic car races in Germany.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E41 Charged! Electricity - not fuel
programme.desc: What happens with the range of electric cars if the stereo and heating are in continuous use? We tested Volkswagen's e-up! and Renault's Zoe in every-day situations. Also: the Opel's hybrid model Ampera. And: the BMW i3, the Bavarian electric hatchback.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Extreme Tuning
programme.desc: Patrick Simon takes a closer look at different tuning methods and tools in Norway. And: the Swiss entrepreneur Ueli Anliker not only created the longest motorcycle in the world but also the most expensive Mercedes SLR, plated with gold and 600 rubies.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S01 : E89 Porsche Carrera Cup Hockenheim
programme.desc: At the Hockenheimring in Germany race drivers from eight nations fight for the crown in the Porsche Carrera Cup in-brand tournament.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E158 Italian Stallion
programme.desc: The Ferrari 458 Speciale is a street-legal race car that fires up emotion. Driving it is unforgettable, just as it is the case with the McLaren 650S, a car that is as fast as the Ferrari but fascinates more on a technical than emotional level.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 The Oldest Car Manufacturers
programme.desc: The invention of the automobile dates back more than 100 years. But which manufacturers have been in the business the longest? We show the top 10 oldest car manufacturers.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 The Most Unusual Cars of Modern Times
programme.desc: You often get the impression that most cars are the same. But if you are looking for something special, you will find it. We present our top 10 selection of the most unusual modern cars.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Trailerstunt
programme.desc: This time, an industrial site is the scene for the stunt extravaganza. The Stunt Heroes' objective: jump through a truck trailer with a car. As usual with such risky car stunts, careful planning, preparation, timing and precision are of the essence.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Behind the Scene
programme.desc: Reporter Dean Malay takes a look behind the scenes of Action Concept and shows the real people behind the Stunt Heroes’ tough-guy image. Coordinator Domi explains the workflows and reveals why stuntman Tobi is called Heidi.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S03 : E196 Birth of a New Legend
programme.desc: With their new DB 11, Aston Martin heads towards the future at full throttle. Also: after its facelift the Nissan GTR presented itself freshly streamlined and more powerful than ever. And: Lamborghini's V10 fighting bull, the Huracán.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E149 Zen Power
programme.desc: The Nissan GTR is a more affordable direct competitor to Porsche's 911 Turbo S or the Audi R8 GT. In addition: one of the ultimate super cars, the Techart 911 Turbo S. And: the Pagani Huayra, presented by Formula 1 Pilot Adrian Sutil.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 The Greatest Car Legends
programme.desc: There are very special car models that remain in the collective memory for decades and generations. We take a look at the ten most legendary cars.

programme.title: Top 10 Show
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 The Strangest Cars
programme.desc: With some cars, you wonder what the designers and manufacturers were thinking. We present what we consider to be the most bizarre cars.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E116 Open-Top Sportscars
programme.desc: The Audi R8 V10 Spyder's design and sophisticated technology was meant to set an example for what a car manufacturer is capable of. In addition: the Wiesmann Roadster MF5. And: Porsche's house tuner Ruf turned up the volume with their RT 35 model.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E125 50th Anniversary of Porsche 911
programme.desc: The Porsche 911 shows stylistic modesty like no other sports car in the world. We explored the history behind this iconic sports car. In addition: Porsche's Turbo S model, the traditional top model of the brand's 911 production series.

programme.title: Supercars
programme.sub-title: S02 : E109 Hot Supercars
programme.desc: Aston Martin V8 Vantage, Porsche 918 Spyder, Bentley Mulsanne, Audi R8 V10 or Bugatti Veyron Grand Sport Super Vitesse. These cars aren't really comparable as each vehicle is unique in its elegance and performance.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S02 : E47 British Sportscar Rarities
programme.desc: In the early 20th century people used to travel in vehicles like the Morgan Threewheeler, a mixture between motorcycle and car, thus avoiding the British tax on cars. We got hold of a 1936 Morgan Threewheeler and went for a ride.

programme.title: Classic Ride
programme.sub-title: S03 : E77 Convertibles for a Country Outing
programme.desc: The BMW 507 Roadster was cherished by superstars like Elvis Presley. Today, the 150 HP sports car from 1955 is one of the most valuable classics of all time. Also: following the footsteps of the iconic Porsche brand in a 356 Cabrio.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 Class reunion
programme.desc: We started a rather unusual race between an S-train and an Audi S3. Also: some of the highlights of the Shanghai Auto Show. And: Mercedes-Benz invested a lot of money in the facelift of their E-Class in order to put their competitors in place.

programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Z Nation
programme.desc: Tricked into a trap by use of a fresh brain lure, Murphy is captured by a zombie fan known as The Collector.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy, Warren, Vasquez and Addy find themselves at a casino while 10K and Doc are captured by Natives.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E11 Z Nation
programme.desc: The group becomes embroiled in corporate politics while seeking shelter at a hotel overtaken by white-collar survivors. There, Murphy is hunted.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Z Nation
programme.desc: Near the Mexican border, the group is rescued from a zombie hoard by Escorpion, who leads them to La Reina, the "Queen of the Dead." As a bounty for Murphy, La Reina offers them a reward or a free pass to join her group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Z Nation
programme.desc: All hell breaks loose when it's discovered that not only does Dr. Kurian's vaccine not work but everyone who was injected will come under Murphy's control after an incubation period.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Z Nation
programme.desc: The team finally arrives in California. As they near their goal, each member thinks back to where they were at the beginning of the apocalypse and what it took to get where they are today.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic flashback movie, the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 1.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E02 Z Nation
programme.desc: In this epic flashback movie, the gang protects the town against a new enemy known as The Man. Part 2.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group are taken prisoner while Murphy manages to escape with his newly formed group of blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Z Nation
programme.desc: While on the road to establish his headquarters in Spokane, Murphy saves the life of a dying girl. When her parents show up and ask to be bitten too, his mission gains momentum. Meanwhile, Warren leads the new mission group to a strange town.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Z Nation
programme.desc: Alone and suffering from the effects of Merch's booster, 10K barely escapes Murphy and is stalked by a blend.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E07 Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc finds himself taken captive by a psychotic nurse and her surviving mental patients, and he later discovers that 10K is being held too.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Z Nation
programme.desc: Seemingly injected with the blend vaccine, The Man attempts to kidnap Murphy but underestimates the strength of Murphy's followers. However, he does manage to learn about Lucy's existence. 10K reunites with the group.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Z Nation
programme.desc: Looking for Lucy, Doc and Addy run into Skeezy and Sketch, who is running for "President of the Apocalypse."

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E11 Z Nation
programme.desc: Upon finding Lucy, Doc and Addy work hard to stay alive and earn the family's trust. After a dangerous game of zombie hide-and-seek, an apocalyptic fairytale and a close call with an ender, Addy and Doc convince the family to follow them to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc tries to find a way to tell Warren about Lucy's kidnapping. In the meantime, he encounters a radio tower and castle-like compound inhabited by three attractive, crafty ladies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren leads an attack against Murphytown to extract its smug leader.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E14 Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy is being pummeled with whatever The Man can throw at her - and Lucy does the same right back.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S03 : E15 Z Nation
programme.desc: Addy and Doc catch up with Warren, but the reunion is short-lived as the group faces the biggest battle yet.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E02 Z Nation
programme.desc: Driven by her dream of a black rainbow and flesh-eating rain, Warren and Murphy escape Zona, while Doc, 10K and Sarge are pinned down by snipers.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Z Nation
programme.desc: When Sun Mei and Red vanish, the group must decide whether to keep looking for them or press on to Newmerica.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Z Nation
programme.desc: Following Warren's dream, the team doesn't stop while crossing the Great Pile, a seemingly endless landscape of rubble and destruction.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Z Nation
programme.desc: The team is captured and enslaved in an elaborate underground facility, forced by their mysterious captors to perform a series of bizarre and dangerous tasks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E07 Z Nation
programme.desc: Shaken by the death a groupmate, something snaps in Murphy. Warren is unable to stop him and the others from committing an atrocity as misplaced revenge.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E08 Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group encounter a mysterious stranger who they think is a grave robber - but turns out to be something much more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E09 Z Nation
programme.desc: The group explores an abandoned TV station while seeking a way to contact Kaya, who is attempting to hide from an invasion of Zona forces at camp Northern Light. Citizen Z returns home after two years.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E10 Z Nation
programme.desc: In Chicago, Doc and Murphy encounter a mysterious - and murderous - group, including Sketchy and Skeezy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E11 Z Nation
programme.desc: The group returns to Mercy Labs, where they first met The Man, to retrieve another item from Warren's dreams.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S04 : E13 Z Nation
programme.desc: In the mind-bending season finale, the team arrives in Washington, D.C. and the secret of Warren's dreams is revealed.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E01 Z Nation
programme.desc: Following the drone crash, Warren is nursed back to health by attractive homesteader Cooper. Meanwhile, the others finally reach Newmerica, and Murphy goes his own way.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Z Nation
programme.desc: In the outpost Altura, 10K searches for Red, Warren discovers George is an old friend, Murphy encounters Sun Mei in her new lab and Doc runs into Citizen Z.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Z Nation
programme.desc: Panic and anti-talker sentiments flare after an explosion derails the vote - and rumors blame a talker. 10K, Sarge and Red are attacked by old-school zombies and suffer devastating losses, and Murphy finds his loyal blends are still out there.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E05 Z Nation
programme.desc: A new spate of terrorist bombings hit Pacifica. In order to follow his vision for human-talker unity, George seeks those responsible for the attacks.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren and the group wind up at a wild casino and shelter for fugitive talkers run by Murphy and his blends.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E07 Z Nation
programme.desc: Doc breaks out special medicine to treat George's injury and explains the Founding Fathers, the Bill of Rights and more.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E08 Z Nation
programme.desc: The group arrives at the farming outpost that produces flour for Z-bizkuits, but it is overrun by zombies, Pandora and starving talkers laying in wait to kill them.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E10 Z Nation
programme.desc: The group discovers Altura militia forces have enslaved talkers to mine hazardous waste for Z-bizkuits.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E11 Z Nation
programme.desc: With help from renegade hackers, Warren and George hack Altura's defenses and discover Estes' secret plan.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Z Nation
programme.desc: Estes imprisons the captive talkers and blends, while Warren and George plan their attack on Altura.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S05 : E13 Z Nation
programme.desc: Warren works with humans, talkers and blends to help George defeat Estes and Pandora. Newmericans can finally vote, but before Warren can relax, Cooper reappears with a shocking revelation.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Z Nation
programme.desc: In need of gas, the team follows a suspicious stranger to a damaged oil refinery deep inside a New Jersey no-go zone packed with zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Z Nation
programme.desc: Out to get Cassandra back, her bizarre and dangerous "family" of cannibals catches up with the team and kidnaps Addy, endangering the mission.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Z Nation
programme.desc: Citizen Z directs the team to a rumored helicopter controlled by a mysterious general living atop a heavily guarded skyscraper - where zombies roam freely.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Z Nation
programme.desc: A tornado forces the team to Warren's hometown, where she searches for her husband who she lost track of in the early days of the apocalypse.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Z Nation
programme.desc: Lost and out of water in rural Kansas, the team is on the verge of breaking up before arriving at a Wild West-style bar. Guns, liquor and a zombie-shooting contest: what could go wrong?

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Z Nation
programme.desc: When the last surviving cosmonaut from the International Space Station crashes on Earth, Citizen Z gets a real, live buddy - but it quickly becomes clear that his new friend has a secret agenda.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Z Nation
programme.desc: Split off from the others, Mack and Addy find themselves trapped by a zombie they just can't kill. A series of escalating fights forces them to confront an ugly truth hidden in their past.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Z Nation
programme.desc: While in South Dakota, an imminent meltdown forces the team to help the locals repair a nearby nuclear power plant full of radiated zombies.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Z Nation
programme.desc: Some strangers earn their ways into the team, taking a keen interest in Murphy, but things take a deadly turn.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Z Nation
programme.desc: A change in plans has the team re-routed to a Colorado viral lab located in a nuclear missile silo. The team searches for Dr. Merch, the developer of the experimental vaccine previously given to Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Z Nation
programme.desc: Picking up moments after the launch of the tactical nuclear weapons, the team is split up trying to outrun the impending blast. Citizen Z finds himself battling thawed zombies, ultimately issuing an on-air bounty for Murphy.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Z Nation
programme.desc: Each member of the group goes through a near-death experience while being attacked by bounty hunters. Mack is bitten after being caught in a zombie-infested stairwell.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Z Nation
programme.desc: On the quest for a cure for the virus, the group makes its way to the greenhouse where Batch 47 is being grown by Odegard. There, Odegard warns them about zombie-plant hybrids.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy's past comes back to haunt him when Serena tracks him down. The team stumbles upon a hidden farm.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E06 Z Nation
programme.desc: Murphy separates from the group out of fear that they may take the baby away - and kill her. Vasquez and Warren are injured and wind up in an abandoned hospital. 10K is forced to make a tragic decision during a conflict with Cassandra.

programme.title: Z Nation
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Z Nation
programme.desc: While crossing the Mississippi River, the group is involved in an accident and 10K is separated. At a nearby settlement, 10K and some new friends run into trouble with the settlement's leader, Escorpion.

programme.title: Ostatnia Misja
programme.desc: Sławny rewolwerowiec powraca do swojej byłej żony, która chce tylko, aby uratował jej męża szeryfa przed zabiciem przez rewolwerowców chcących uwolnić skazanego więźnia.

programme.title: Nagroda Jest Twoja... Człowiek Mój
programme.desc: Grupa zabójców poszukuje rewolwerowca El Puro, by zdobyć 10 000 dolarów nagrody.

programme.title: Nadchodzi Durango, Płać Albo Giń
programme.desc: Windykator wplątuje się w niebezpieczną sytuację, gdy skorumpowany biznesmen, dla którego odzyskał 100 000 dolarów, nie chce mu zapłacić zwyczajowego procentu za jego usługi.

programme.title: On ma umrzeć
programme.desc: Po brutalnym morderstwie siostry Clayton wyrusza w bezlitosną misję zemsty. "I Want Him Dead" to surowy spaghetti western z mocną rolą Craiga Hilla, świetną muzyką i charakterystyczną obsadą gatunku. Intensywna kamera i mroczny klimat czynią z niego jeden z bardziej cenionych filmów o zemście w stylu spaghetti.

programme.title: Bezbożnicy
programme.desc: Banita i łowca nagród poszukują meksykańskiego bandyty Corbancho, który grasuje w okolicach El Paso, obrabował bank w Tuscon i uciekł z 400 000 dolarów.

programme.title: Człowiek z Utah
programme.desc: Szeryf wysyła Johna Westona na rodeo, aby dowiedział się, kto zabija tam jeźdźcówmających wygrać nagrodę pieniężną. Barton zorganizował rodeo i planuje wyjechać z całą nagrodą pieniężną ufundowaną przez mieszkańców miasteczka. Kiedy wydaje się, że Weston pokona jeźdźca Bartona, jego ludzie przygotowują dla niego taki sam los, jaki spotkał innych jeźdźców.

programme.title: Kto pragnie zemsty?
programme.desc: Dwóch rewolwerowców wjeżdża do miasta z planem odebrania dużej, acz niezasłużonej nagrody. Zostają wplątani w lokalną wojnę o ziemię związaną ze zbliżającą się budową kolei.

programme.title: Śmierć Nie Dba o Czas
programme.desc: Meksykański chłop eksmitowany ze swojej ziemi staje się rozwścieczonym banitą. W końcu zostaje aresztowany i trafia do więzienia.

programme.title: Przekręt w cuglach
programme.desc: George Parradine kupuje ranczo jako kryjówkę dla swojej bandy, chcąc oszukać inwestora Josha Taylora. Prawnik i geodeta to tak naprawdę Jack Reynolds, syn zabitego właściciela, który szuka prawdy. Szeryf Rocky Lane, udając rewolwerowca, wraz z Nuggetem Clarkiem próbuje odkryć spisek.

programme.title: Rewolwerowiec z Jalisco
programme.desc: Salvador kocha się w pięknej Marii, niestety jej ojciec nie akceptuje ich związku.

programme.title: Przeklęte Rewolwery z Dallas
programme.desc: Wyjęty spod prawa Szybkoręki (Álvarez) napada na dyliżans, którym podróżuje Clay Stone (Beir), piosenkarka Katy Dior (Marandi) i hazardzista Fred Foster (Mathot). Stone będzie szukał zemsty.

programme.title: El Rojo
programme.desc: Rodzina Sorensonów zostaje zamordowana. Wygląda na to, że przez Indian. Obok miejsca zbrodni wyrasta miasteczko Gold Hill, którym rządzi grupę biznesmenów.

programme.title: Tropiciele
programme.desc: Jeff poprzysięga zemstę na pięciu bandytach, którzy zniszczyli życie jego siostry. Każdemu z nich zostawia ślad – fragment jej poncza. Brutalna, intensywna historia o bólu, sprawiedliwości i determinacji.

programme.title: Dzień bezprawia
programme.desc: Ranczer Blaise Starrett i osadnicy są skłóceni, ale gdy brutalny gang Jacka Bruhna napada na ich miasteczko, muszą zjednoczyć siły. Tylko razem mają szansę na przetrwanie nocy i ocalenie swojej społeczności.

programme.title: Przeżegnaj się Nieznajomy
programme.desc: Łowca nagród chce schwytać bandytę imieniem Carson, ponieważ jego gang jest wart dużo pieniędzy.

programme.title: A Niebo Będzie Nam Dachem
programme.desc: Dwoje włóczęgów spotyka się i wkrótce stają się towarzyszami podróży. Ale jeden z nich, Tim (Gemma), jest ścigany przez szalonego mordercę i jego bandę rewolwerowców, którzy chcą wyrównać stare porachunki.

programme.title: Pojedynek Kogutów
programme.desc: Dwóch oszustów niszczy lokalną gospodarkę małego miasteczka, które odwiedzają... ale potem zakochują się w dwóch młodych kobietach spokrewnionych z bogatymi właścicielami ziemskimi, którzy są celem ich głównego oszustwa.

programme.title: Doktor Złote Ręce
programme.desc: Były chirurg Doc McGregor jest teraz karciarzem. Zostaje niesłusznie oskarżony o morderstwo i ścigany przez Slade'a, łowcę nagród.

programme.title: Tylko Waleczni
programme.desc: Mało lubiany dowódca kawalerii zostaje przez swój oddział niesprawiedliwie obwiniony za śmierć jednego z oficerów. Musi teraz odkupić winy i udowodnić swoim ludźmi, że się mylili.

programme.title: Dolary Dla McGregorów
programme.desc: Niejaki Forsythe, łowca głów, używa swojej żony jako przynęty na bandytów. Jeden numer się nie udaje i jego żona ginie. Forsythe wyrusza w pościg za mordercą, ale do pogoni dołącza tajemniczy jeździec...

programme.title: Degueyo
programme.desc: Bandyci Ramona atakują Danger City w pogoni za skarbem. Mordują lub porywają mężczyzn, a kobiety i dzieci stają w obliczu groźby „Deguello”. Czterech mężczyzn, tropiących Ramona, decyduje się pomóc miastu w desperackiej obronie.

programme.title: Więzienie Hellgate
programme.desc: Żołnierz Unii oskarżony o szpiegostwo trafia do odosobnionego więzienia na pustyni. Po nieudanej próbie ucieczki trafia do izolatki. Gdy wybucha epidemia, pojawia się szansa na odkupienie – czy z niej skorzysta? Przejmujący dramat o winie, nadziei i drugiej szansie.

programme.title: Banita
programme.desc: Nowy szeryf Pat Garrett wita dawnego przyjaciela Doca Hollidaya, który szuka skradzionego konia. Gdy zwierzę okazuje się być u Billy’ego Kida, między Billym a Docem rodzi się niespodziewana więź, psując relacje z Patem. Napięcia rosną, szczególnie gdy Doc ukrywa rannego Billy’ego u Rio, co komplikuje ich losy w cieniu nadciągającego ataku Indian.

programme.title: Czarny Orzeł z Santa Fe
programme.desc: Gdy Komancze szykują się do wojny, osadnicy chronią się w forcie Eagle Rock. Tajny agent McPherson odkrywa spisek ranczera Mortona, który podburza Indian, by przejąć ropę z rezerwatu. Sojusze się zmieniają, a decydująca bitwa zbliża się.

programme.title: Zabójczy Dzieciak
programme.desc: Bezwzględny i okrutny kapitan Ramirez poluje na rewolucjonistów w poszukiwaniu Świętego - prawego przywódcy meksykańskiej rewolucji przeciwko Federales.

programme.title: Ramon - Meksykanin
programme.desc: Esmerelda zostaje zaatakowana, a jej brat Juan Morales ginie, co wywołuje konflikt rodzinny. Bandziory pod wodzą Ramona Morales napadają na ranczo, zabijając ojca i porywając Esmereldę. Slim Baxter mimo próśb matki podejmuje walkę o zemstę i sprawiedliwość.

programme.title: Pojedynek ranczerów
programme.desc: Amerykański western w wersji z polskim lektorem - Pojedynek ranczerów.Spór o spadek po zmarłym ranczerze przeradza się w krwawy konflikt.

programme.title: Bonanza Kompilacja - Odcinki 31, 32, 33
programme.desc: Kompilacja serialu Bonanza z polskim lektorem opowiada o przygodach Bena Cartwrighta i jego trzech synów, którzy prowadzą ranczo na Dzikim Zachodzie w Nevadzie. Każdy z odcinków przedstawia ich zmagania z lokalnymi problemami, niebezpieczeństwami oraz walkę o sprawiedliwość, pomagając społeczności.

programme.title: Wynajęty człowiek
programme.desc: Harry Collings wraca po latach wędrówek do żony i farmy. Choć kobieta z trudem akceptuje jego powrót, wciąż wierzy w odbudowę wspólnego życia. Harry staje jednak przed wyborem między dawnymi przyjaźniami a nową odpowiedzialnością, co wystawi jego lojalność i uczucia na ciężką próbę.

programme.title: Może Bóg ci wybaczy... lecz nie ja
programme.desc: Kiedy Cjamango jest z dala od swojego rancza, sześciu bandytów atakuje i zabija wszystkich członków jego rodziny.

programme.title: Krwawa Dziewiątka
programme.desc: Oddział kawalerii zostaje wybity w zasadzce, ocala jedynie sierżant z córką i siedmiu brutalnych więźniów. Bez koni i wagonu muszą przedzierać się przez góry. Sierżant staje przed desperackim zadaniem: doprowadzić skazańców do więzienia, chronić córkę i odkryć, który z nich zabił jego żonę.

programme.title: Długie dni zemsty
programme.desc: Po trzech latach katorgi w pustynnym więzieniu były szeryf Ted Barnett ucieka, by odnaleźć trzech mężczyzn, którzy wrobili go w zabójstwo ojca i skazali na wieloletnie roboty. Rozpoczyna samotne polowanie, by odkryć prawdę i oczyścić swoje imię.

programme.title: Pojedynek w słońcu
programme.desc: Po egzekucji ojca Pearl Chavez trafia do rodziny w Teksasie. Miła Laura Belle i uczciwy Jesse ją przyjmują, lecz surowy senator McCanles i namiętny Lewt tworzą napięcie, które prowadzi do dramatycznych wydarzeń w ranczu.

programme.title: I Rzekł Pan do Kaina
programme.desc: Mężczyzna mści się na rodzinie, przez którą został niesłusznie skazany na dziesięć lat ciężkich robót.

programme.title: Kolej Canadian Pacific
programme.desc: Tom Andrews odkrywa przejście przez Góry Skaliste dla kolei, lecz handlarz futrami Rourke sabotuje budowę i rywalizuje o Cecille. Tom zostaje ranny przez sabotaż, ratuje go transfuzja. Cecille odkrywa zdradę ojca i konfrontuje Rourke’a, uciekając przed nim.

programme.title: Niesłusznie oskarżeni
programme.desc: Trzej kowboje, Wes, Vern i Otis, przypadkowo trafiają do kryjówki bandytów. Gdy grupa mścicieli atakuje chatę, Wes i Vern uciekają, lecz zostają omyłkowo uznani za członków gangu. Ścigani przez prawo, muszą udowodnić swoją niewinność, zanim dopadnie ich niesprawiedliwa kara.

programme.title: Generał
programme.desc: Kolorowa wersja filmu. Kiedy szpiedzy Unii kradną ukochaną lokomotywę inżyniera, ten samotnie ściga ją prosto przez linie wroga.

programme.title: Ręce Do Góry Truposzu! Jesteś Aresztowany
programme.desc: Sando Kid (Peter Lee Lawrence), ocalały z rzezi urządzonej przez wojska północy, szuka zemsty. Działa w pojedynkę i uderza w każdą osobę zamieszaną w masakrę.

programme.title: Czterech strzelców
programme.desc: Do Purgatory przybywa rewolwerowiec Sabin, podający się za wybawcę, choć to on zabił prawdziwego pogromcę. Za swoją misję żąda 500 dolarów dla wdowy po jednym z mężczyzn, którego sam zastrzelił. Postanawia oczyścić miasteczko z władzy sparaliżowanego bossa, który wysyła przeciw niemu trzech zabójców.

programme.title: Zemsta Ringo
programme.desc: Dwóch poszukiwaczy przygód ratuje życie mężczyzny, który ma na plecach wytatuowaną mapę skarbów. Druga potrzebna mapa znajduje się na plecach szeryfa. Zaczyna się polowanie.

programme.title: Z Zimną Krwią
programme.desc: Pewien nastolatek jest rozdarty między kochającą go dziewczyną a tajemniczym nieznajomym, który popycha go do zabijania.

programme.title: Strefa kwarantanny
