programme.desc: Co się dzieje, gdy wybucha epidemia, ale jesteś trzymany w niepewności? Film. Wszystko może się zdarzyć. Powoli mieszkańcy zdają sobie sprawę, że wszyscy zginą, jeśli nie zjednoczą się ze sobą.

programme.title: Dziennik Grubego Chłopca
programme.desc: Jimmy Winterpock w wieku czternastu lat ma 1,6m wzrostu i waży 85kg. Poza domem rodzinnym i kościołem, życie Jimmy'ego to ciągła walka. Okrutne kpiny jego kolegów z klasy sprawiają, że chodzenie do szkoły lub uprawianie sportu jest upokarzającym doświadczeniem. Wciąż jednak udaje mu się skupić na swoich celach; schudnąć i zdobyć dziewczynę swoich marzeń.

programme.title: Płótno
programme.desc: Canvas to opowieść o artyście, który stara się odnaleźć spójną estetykę i równowagę w miłości do sztuki, kobiety i brata.

programme.title: Miłość Jest Wrogiem Wielkiej, Głuchej Pustki
programme.desc: Pogrążony w cieniu dwóch dysfunkcyjnych romantycznych związków Hank wkracza w świat depresji przenikającej się z nowymi możliwościami. Kiedy poznaje niejaką Rose, wpadając na nią wiele razy w miejscach publicznych, zaczyna się między nimi romans w sposób, w jaki większość ludzi przeżywa przygodę na jedną noc. Hank walczy o sens życia, jako bezrobotny miłośnik przesypiania całych dni i nieudolny w utrzymaniu funkcjonalnego związku ze swoją byłą narzeczoną, Jill. Dopiero brutalne przebudzenie podczas intymnego wieczoru z Jill sprawia, że świat Hanka całkowicie się załamuje. Kiedy już wydaje się, że nic mu się nie uda, Hank znajduje nowy powód do życia.

programme.title: Boże Dopomóż!
programme.desc: W tej komedii o seksualnych skandalach w kościele Rain pojawiają się przerysowane osobowości i chaos.

programme.title: Gotowi, Chętni i Zdolni
programme.desc: Samantha Martin zostaje ranna podczas jednej z misji i jest zmuszona do przejścia na emeryturę z CIA. Odkrywa, że kret w CIA współpracuje z terrorystami w celu zdobycia broni chemicznej, która ma zostać zniszczona przez rząd USA. Nie mogąc skontaktować się z CIA, tworzy zgraną grupę kolegów z CIA, aby powstrzymać terrorystów i zdemaskować nieuczciwego agenta CIA.

programme.title: Morderstwo Nad Rzeką Wolf
programme.desc: Dwóch najlepszych przyjaciół szuka ucieczki ze świata pełnego niebezpieczeństw.

programme.title: Falsyfikat
programme.desc: Daniel Jakor jest jednym z najbardziej płodnych i odnoszących sukcesy artystów, o jakich świat nigdy nie słyszał. Walcząc o sprzedaż własnej sztuki, wkrótce odkrywa, że jego prawdziwy geniusz nie polega na tworzeniu własnych dzieł, ale na fałszowaniu wielkich mistrzów, którzy przyszli przed nim.

programme.title: Pomocy! Mój Detektyw Jest Idiotą!
programme.desc: Beznadziejny detektyw z Nowego Orleanu Biff Basham zostaje wplątany w sprawę szantażu, szpiegostwa i morderstw.

programme.title: Oracabessa
programme.desc: Podczas odkupieńczej podróży w celu odnalezienia zaginionego 6-letniego chłopca, pewna studentka krzyżuje ścieżki z bezwzględnymi handlarzami ludźmi.

programme.title: Pudło Zagłady
programme.desc: Kobieta budzi się zamknięta w małym pokoju nie pamiętając, jak się tam znalazła. Bez możliwości ucieczki i dręczona przez paranormalne byty, kobieta musi odkryć kim jest i jak znalazła się w pokoju.

programme.title: Specjalność zakładu
programme.desc: Samotny mężczyzna z trzeciego pokolenia właścicieli wielkiej sieci restauracji Tortilla Hut musi znaleźć nowe danie do menu. W wiejskiej restauracji w Nowym Meksyku poznaje uroczą, znakomitą szefową kuchni.

programme.title: Omen
programme.desc: Mirę nawiedzają coraz to straszniejsze koszmary. Jej ojciec postanawia wyjechać z córką i swoją ciężarną żoną z dala od miasta na ustronne ranczo w Teksasie. Liczy, że tam rodzina odpocznie.

programme.title: Zwyczajna Rodzina
programme.desc: Cztero osobową rodzinę dopada ich ukryte życie, izolacja od siebie nawzajem i przeszłość. Kulminacją jest jedyna rzecz, której unikali... konfrontacja. Rodzina rozpada się, gdy żona i matka ukrywa swój alkoholizm, a mąż próbuje ukryć swoje pożądanie do innej kobiety. Córka eksperymentuje z seksem, narkotykami i alkoholem, a syn tworzy sobie wyimaginowanego przyjaciela, który jest jego opiekunem.

programme.title: Wielka Stopa
programme.desc: Pewna rodzina wprowadza się do domku na odludziu tylko po to, by dać się sterroryzować dziwnemu, przerażającemu stworzeniu z lasu.

programme.title: Tandem Hearts
programme.desc: Przeprowadzka do Portland w Oregonie i znalezienie pracy w gastronomii jest łatwe dla Paula i Ramony. Zmagający się z problemami muzyk, pozbawiony kolegów z zespołu, Paul staje się introwertyczny i nastrojowy.

programme.title: Nadzieja
programme.desc: Młody człowiek sięga dna i nie ma dokąd się zwrócić. Traci wszelką nadzieję, pragnienie i motywację. Dzięki wierze i zaufaniu do Boga powoli buduje się na nowo.

programme.title: Beach Love
programme.desc: Zmuszony do opieki nad młodszą siostrą po stracie obojga rodziców, szesnastolatek trafia do zagranicznego miasteczka surfingowego z prawie zniedołężniałymi dziadkami, ale szybko znajduje ukojenie w fantazjach o pin-up girl i wyrusza, by ją odnaleźć. Wyruszając w drogę kradzionym samochodem z nieproszonym gościem, jego poszukiwania prowadzą do wielu wyzwań, samopoznania i, co zaskakujące, nowej miłości." Written By Melanie McAvoy.

programme.title: Starzy Znajomi
programme.desc: Mężczyzna z nadwagą spotyka na szkolnej bieżni dawną koleżankę z klasy. Gdy oboje stają się sobie bliscy i inspirują się nawzajem, ich przeszłość wkrada się z powrotem do ich życia i zaczyna zagrażać wszystkiemu, co wypracowali.

programme.title: Długi John Silver: Powrót na wyspę skarbów
programme.desc: Long John Silver trafia na Karaiby, gdzie dowiaduje się o porwaniu córki gubernatora i Jima Hawkinsa przez pirata Mendozę. Silver planuje ich ratunek, licząc też na zdobycie statku i powrót po skarby. Jednak misja szybko okazuje się znacznie trudniejsza, niż zakładał.

programme.title: Ukryte Piękno
programme.desc: Zderzają się światy pogrążonego w depresji psychologa i rozchwianej emocjonalnie bezdomnej kobiety. Próbując ją ratować, zakochują się w sobie, a każde z nich dostaje drugą szansę na nowe życie.

programme.title: Wszyscy jesteśmy równi
programme.desc: Zarozumiały, dobrze zapowiadający się prawnik, niechętnie podejmuje się prowadzeni pozwu Archidiecezji Nowego Orleanu za dyskryminację ze względu na płeć. O pomoc prosi go kobieta, która desperacko chce zostać księdzem.

programme.title: Kapitan Battle
programme.desc: Sam Battle podąża śladami swojego pradziadka, super bohatera z II wojny światowej znanego jako CAPTAIN BATTLE, przyjmując eksperymentalny lek podczas pobytu w wojsku.

programme.title: Księżna z Cancun
programme.desc: Mężczyzna wciąż zakochany w swojej byłej dziewczynie zgadza się pojechać z nią do Cancun, gdzie spotyka miejscową dziewczynę - co zmusza go do zakwestionowania wszystkiego, czego chce w życiu.

programme.title: Gęsto
programme.desc: To opowieść o wschodzącej magnatce nieruchomości THERESIE JAMES, która dla dodatkowych korzyści finansowych prowadzi w swojej dzielnicy nielegalne interesy.

programme.title: Wszystko Jest Możliwe
programme.desc: Młody chłopiec zostaje oddzielony od matki, która zaginęła podczas podróży do Japonii w której miała pomagać z walce ze skutkami tsunami. Film porusza takie tematy jak bezdomność, życie rodziny wojskowej i adopcja.

programme.title: Cierpienie
programme.desc: David O'Hara jest studentem medycyny z problemami, który porywa, gwałci i morduje kobiety. Zapładnia jedną ze swoich ofiar, Melissę Daniels, próbując w ten sposób zastąpić sobie rodzinę, którą stracił jako młody chłopak. Jednak policja ratuje Melissę. David wpada w morderczy szał, by odzyskać rodzinę.

programme.title: Pomiędzy Światami
programme.desc: Opowieść o młodym pisarzu, który próbuje pogodzić się z dziewczyną i przetrwać zawiłości nocnego życia stolicy, korzystając jedynie z pomocy swoich imprezujących, dowcipkujących przyjaciół, którzy ciągną go od jednego londyńskiego nocnego lokalu do drugiego.

programme.title: Poznaj Hope
programme.desc: Historie miłosne dziadka pouczają mężczyznę i dziewczynę o realiach miłości.

programme.title: Słodko-gorzki Poniedziałek
programme.desc: Emocjonalne pożegnanie wieloletnich najlepszych przyjaciół prowadzi do nieoczekiwanego romansu.

programme.title: Masz rakietę, to do gwiazd!
programme.desc: The Three Stooges przypadkowo startują rakietą i lądują na Wenus. Tam czekają na nich gadający jednorożec, ziejąca ogniem tarantula i komputer, który tworzy ich złe klony. Szalona komedia sci-fi pełna gagów i absurdalnych przygód!

programme.title: Tarzan i Zielona Bogini
programme.desc: Lord Greystoke, czyli Tarzan, opowiada o przygodach w Gwatemali, gdzie pomagał majorowi Martlingowi i Uli Vale w poszukiwaniu Zielonej Bogini. Totem, w którym ukryta była formuła materiału wybuchowego, jest celem bandytów i prymitywnych plemion. Tarzan musi stawić czoła niebezpieczeństwom, by ocalić totem.

programme.title: Darowany koń
programme.desc: Po stracie matki Amanda pracuje na ranczu biznesmena. Gdy jego córka odrzuca nowego konia, dziewczyna postanawia go trenować. Odkrywając talent Misty, odzyskuje nadzieję i radość.

programme.title: Osadzony
programme.desc: Weteran wojenny Ray trafia do brutalnego więzienia za obronę swojej narzeczonej. Wśród przemocy, układów i manipulacji ze strony naczelnika, walczy o przetrwanie. Jego jedynym celem jest wyjść z więzienia i wrócić do ukochanej.

programme.title: Hibiskus
programme.desc: Młody pracownik cmentarza musi w tajemnicy przez 3 dni opiekować się dziewczyną.

programme.title: Detektyw Malone - Ostatnia misja
programme.desc: W ogarniętej wojną Jugosławii partyzanci walczą o przetrwanie, a USA wahają się przed interwencją. Serbscy terroryści przenoszą walkę do Ameryki, by zniechęcić ONZ. Porucznik Malone, wspierany przez piękną piosenkarkę, ściga ich jeden po drugim, zanim ONZ podejmie decyzję, która może zapobiec nowej wojnie.

programme.title: Szybcy i Szaleni
programme.desc: Jako dziecko w latach osiemdziesiątych w RPA, Lukas marzy o tym, by zostać mistrzem wyścigów na ćwierć mili. Jego mama mówi mu, żeby trzymał się z dala od tych ludzi, ponieważ są rasistami. Lukas jest zbyt młody, by wiedzieć, co to jest rasista i słyszy to jako "rasista". Film śledzi jego podróż jako młodego człowieka we współczesnej RPA, gdzie ograniczenia wynikające z koloru skóry nie mają już zastosowania... od zera do bohatera w 10 sekund! Z pomocą dwóch szalonych bio-chemików, Lukas będzie ścigał tytuł króla ćwierć mili w Brakpan!

programme.title: Dom na Rockingham
programme.desc: Młoda kobieta podejmuje pracę jako pomoc domowa. Z czasem dowiaduje się, że właściciel domu może być powiązany ze zniknięciem jej siostry.

programme.title: Zniszczenie
programme.desc: W środku nocy Donovan jedzie ze swoją dziewczyną Lucy i kilkoma przyjaciółmi na sekretne spotkanie w lesie.

programme.title: Z Premedytacją
programme.desc: Czterech niezależnych filmowców zapuszcza się do małego wiejskiego miasteczka na festiwal filmowy i obiecujące spotkanie z dyrektorem filmowym. Zostają wtrąceni do więzienia za ohydną zbrodnię, a nikt nie pamięta wydarzeń z poprzedniej nocy.

programme.title: Last of the Clintons
programme.desc: Icon of early talking pictures, Harry Carey (Red River), portrays the rugged Trigger Carson, a noble cowboy who infiltrates an outlaw gang in order to expose their rackets. Ordered to kidnap a young girl, his identity is revealed and he is forced to fight his way out of the gang and back to safety. Already 56 by the time he signed on to do this and a series of Westerns for Berke Productions, the stately Carrey (who netted an Oscar nomination four years later) was widely lauded at the time for adding a great deal of maturity and respectability due to his undeniable presence and strong performances.

programme.title: Neath Canadian Skies
programme.desc: It's the mounties versus claim jumpers in this drama from Golden Gate Pictures. Based on an action-packed novel by James Oliver Curwood and directed by B. Reeves Maynard (Undersea Kingdom, The Phantom Empire), the film features an outstanding cast of Poverty Row regulars, including Russell Hayden, Inez Cooper, Cliff Nazarro, I. Stanford Jolley, and Kermit Maynard. For movie buffs: Cinematographer Marcel Le Picard began his career in the silent era and finished with exactly 200 credits!

programme.title: The Dude Ranger
programme.desc: Its nothing but action and thrills when an Easterner inherits a cattle ranch and discovers that thousands of cattle have been stolen. Secretly, he signs on as a hired hand at his own ranch to uncover the thief. Once he realizes whats going on, the city boy becomes a hard-riding, avenging son of a six- shooter! Directed by Edward F. Cline from a story by Zane Grey, the film stars George OBrien, Irene Hervey, and LeRoy Mason.

programme.title: Broadway to Cheyenne
programme.desc: A gang of big-city thugs trying to set up a protection racket out west meet their match in this B-Western from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Rex Bell, billed on the old print ads as The heroic idol of young America! stars as Breezy Kildare, a New York detective who happens to be in Wyoming. When Breezy leads a group of cattleman against the well-armed city boys, the bad guys will wish theyd stayed in New York! The rest of the cast includes such favorites from the period as George Gabby Hayes, Roy DArcy, and Marceline Day. (Day worked opposite everyone from John Wayne to Buster Keaton, but retired from acting shortly after this movie at age 25.) Directed by Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: Young Bill Hickock
programme.desc: Roy Rogers stars as the title character in this actionpacked feature from Republic Pictures. Starring Sally Payne as Calamity Jane, and Rogerss ongoing sidekick George Gabby Hayes, this twofisted saga relives some of Americas most colorful days, and also has time for a few musical numbers, including Up and Down the Prairie, and When the Shadows Fall Across the Rockies.

programme.title: The Gunman from Bodie
programme.desc: The Rough Riders, a popular group that thrilled audiences in the early 1940s, are after a gang of rustlers in this B-western from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Buck Jones, Tim McCoy, and Raymond Hatton, this movie features everything from lawmen going undercover to the Rough Riders looking after an orphaned baby! Also, be on the lookout for the beautiful Christine McIntyre, who would go on to appear in several of the Three Stooges shorts for Colombia Pictures.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Annie and the Twisted Trails
programme.desc: Feeling envious about Annies freedom and trick riding skills, Della runs away from home to see her boyfriend when the rodeo comes to town. While on her own, she meets a couple that secretly wants to rob her father.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Carolyn Craig, Ewing Mitchell, and Myron Healey. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 The Robinhood Kid
programme.desc: Tensions rise as a range war over water seems inevitable. A masked man dressed as Robin Hood tries to help the homesteaders by knocking down the ranchers fences. Things seem to be going well until a similarly dressed imposter robs the Diablo bank.Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was niominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Indian Justice
programme.desc: A member of Teddy Roosevelts Roughriders returns to Diablo to take the valuable land he had been promised. When he arrives, he discovers that the land is part of an Indian reservation. Things quickly turn from bad to worse when a corrupt land agent frames the man for murdering a brave with the hope of inciting an Indian war, which he will use for his own desires for the valuable land. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Showdown at Diablo
programme.desc: Diablo is in danger when a gang of hired killers comes to town. Lofty finds himself conflicted as he is reluctant to take on the gang once he discovers the leader rescued him back in their days in the U.S. Cavalry. With the state senator possibly the target of the gang, the townspeople call for Lofty to resign amid his reluctance. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primtetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Renegade's Return
programme.desc: Dave Morgan, an honest lawyer, faces off with Carter Holmes, a crooked politician, in a fiery election campaign. Things take a turn for the worse when Holmes attempts to have his opponent killed. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E16 The Outlaw Brand
programme.desc: Looking through an old trunk, Tagg and his friend Johnny Ward, the son of a murdered lawman, find proof that his uncle is an ex-convict and may be involved in a recent bank robbery. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E19 The Reckless Press
programme.desc: The bank is robbed and the sheriff is killed while everyone is distracted by the wedding between Sand Creeks newspaper editor and a beautiful brunette. The sheriff being the editors best man, the grief-stricken editor begins to escalate the anger towards a suspected drifter with his bias reporting. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E20 Flint and Steel
programme.desc: Annie is on the case when homesteaders are forced to sell their land for cheap due to suspicious circumstances. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E21 Tagg Oakley, Sheriff
programme.desc: Tagg Oakley finds himself in trouble after being tricked into driving a wagon full of gunpowder to Fort Yuma, unaware that Geronimo and his Apache braves are waiting for the wagon to pass. Realizing Tagg is in danger, Annie and Lofty race to the rescue. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E22 The Waco Kid
programme.desc: Annie writes to the son of an old female pedlar, unaware that he is a member of an outlaw gang, now on their way to Diablo. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Also starring Slim Pickens. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S03 : E23 The Saga of Clement O' Toole
programme.desc: Mistaken for a notorious outlaw, a young man struggles to convince the townspeople that he didnt commit a stagecoach robbery. Initially, Annie and Susan Meriwether believe him, but his innocence comes into question when he is present during a bank robbery in which the outlaws seem to recognize him. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Gunplay
programme.desc: With the sheriff off looking for an outlaw, a fake sheriff takes his place, leading to a senseless murder. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This enetertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Will
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho protect a man being chased by outlaws who believe he is responsible for a gold robbery. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Renegade Son
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho break a woman out of prison before she is hanged for murder.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog.. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E15 Lynching Story
programme.desc: A town blames the son-in-law of a the bank president for his murder. Cisco and Pancho work to uncover the truth before the townspeople hang the man. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E16 Newspaper Crusader
programme.desc: After arriving in the town of Sundance, Cisco witnesses the destruction of a newspaper office. Upon seeing this, Cisco contends with the man trying to take over the town. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. This episode aired in 1950. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E17 Dog Story
programme.desc: Cisco witnesses a dog identifying the murderer of his master. He then tries to prove that the dog is right. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E18 Confession for Money
programme.desc: A man confesses to a murder he did not commit in order to pay for his mother's surgery. Cisco and Pancho work to prove his innocence. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E19 The Old Bum
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho aid a poor man who gets caught up in a cattle rustling operation. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E20 Haven for Heavies
programme.desc: Cisco heads to the town of Twin Buttes and finds a haven for criminals. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 . This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Pancho Held Hostage
programme.desc: Pancho is taken hostage by a bank robber's sister.Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. . The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Freight Line Feud
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho work to clear the name of a man who is accused of robbing freights in order to force a woman's freighting company out of business. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Daniel Boone
programme.desc: In 1775, Daniel Boone (George O'Brien) leads thirty colonial families to Kentucky where they face the threats of Native American marauders led by rebel Simon Girty (John Carradine). That's just the beginning, for there are even more dangers and clashes ahead for Boone and his party. With a cast that includes Ralph Forbes, Heather Angel, and lovable child star Dickie Jones, director David Howard takes us through one of the most exciting periods in American history!

programme.title: Enemy of the Law
programme.desc: Tex Ritter stars in this western drama about a man who goes undercover to befriend a convict believed to have stolen a shipment of government gold. Also starring Guy Wilkerson as Panhandle Perkins, this offering from Hollywoods Poverty Row features the usual fistfights and entertaining storyline that made these modestly budgeted features well worth watching. Songs include Teach Me To Forget and You Will Have to Pay both sung by Tex!

programme.title: McLintock
programme.desc: He likes his whiskey hard... His women soft... And his west all to himself! Inspired by Shakespeares The Taming of the Shrew (1594), John Wayne (The Searchers, Stagecoach), Maureen OHara (Miracle on 34th Street, The Parent Trap), and Patrick Wayne (The Searchers, The Alamo) star in this western comedy directed by Andrew V. McLaglen (Gunsmoke, The Wild Geese). George Washington McLintock (John Wayne) is the wealthiest man in his territory who utilizes his power and influence to maintain order between farmers, ranchers, Indians, corrupt government officials, and his own family! McLintock is McNificent!

programme.title: The Deadly Companions
programme.desc: An unholy alliance! Marking the feature film debut of one of Hollywoods most influential and widely referenced auteur directors, Sam Peckinpah, The Deadly Companions centers on a redemptive journey to escort a funeral procession through dangerous Indian Territory. Featuring fine work from a top-notch cast that includes the inimitable Maureen OHara at the height of her illustrious career, Peckinpahs first foray into film provides a promising glance into the energetic and violent nature of his iconic later works.

programme.title: Death Valley
programme.desc: A love story and a search for gold in the Valley of Death! Dubbed simple, powerful and dramatic by the New York Times on the date of its release, Death Valley is indeed an elegant depiction of love and deception in the American desert during the Gold Rush. In what was to be the final film of famed silent film director Paul Powell (Polyanna), a cast of mostly unknown actors produces uniformly excellent work. Lyrical and graceful, Powells film spins the tale of a young boy who finds love and gold, only to have it stolen from him.

programme.title: The Red Rope
programme.desc: Hired killers and Old West outlaws stand front and center in this riveting tale from Hollywoods Poverty Row. Bob Steele, one of the busiest stars in movie history (everything from the silent era to Republic Pictures to working with Clint Eastwood in Hang Em High) is here as Tom Shaw, the target of a bad mans desperation and hate. Steele appeared in more than 240 movies and television shows, but was never more impressive than in The Red Rope!

programme.title: The Terror of Tiny Town
programme.desc: Some incredibly small actors were hired to star in this peculiar cult film. It's all about the villainous Bat Haines (Little Billy Rhodes), who is wreaking havoc on Tiny Town. Can Buck Lawson (Billy Curtis) and the townspeople band together and drive him away? This oddity, which was originally distributed by Columbia Pictures, was directed by one of the most prolific low budget filmmakers in Hollywood history, Sam Newfield, a man with over 200 movies to his credit. While it has appeared on many Worst of all time lists, it deserves to be seen at least once!

programme.title: Brand of the Devil
programme.desc: The Texas Rangers tangle with a band of dangerous rustlers in this two-fisted production from Hollywood's Poverty Row. Starring Dave O'Brien, Kermit Maynard, and Guy Wilkerson, with direction by low-budget ace Harry L. Fraser.

programme.title: With Sitting Bull at the Spirit Lake Massacre
programme.desc: A long-thought-lost film finally surfaces after being unseen for over eight decades. Created and copyrighted by Sunset Productions in 1925 but not released until June 15, 1927, this silent epic features the superior Native American actor Chief Yowlachie (performing here under the name Chief Yowlache) as Sitting Bull. Other fine actors in the cast include the always popular Bryant Washburn and a young Bob Steele, who appears under his real name Bob Bradbury Jr. The story takes place in the 1860s or 1870s near Spirit Lake, Iowa. Settlements of whites are growing in that region but the Sioux Indians also have professed their interest in one such settlement. Chief Sitting Bull surveys the...

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E25 Sidewinder
programme.desc: In this episode, the scourge of the Southwest is a ruthless and devious killer known as the Sidewinder. When a hapless Cavalryman escorting the criminal falls victim to his tricks, Pat and Sonny set out to track him down and bring him in. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Stolen Dynamite
programme.desc: Pat Gallagher and his sidekick Stoney Crockett are Secret Service agents in the Old West, dispatched by the government to investigate crimes threatening the young nation. This episode, Stolen Dynamite, stars Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan. In this episode, the G-men nab a beautiful spy.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Is There a Doctor in the Roundhouse
programme.desc: Railroad CEO Norman Curtis breaks the Cannonball's throttle lever, threatening the success of the Shady Rest Hotel's annual jamboree. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Norman Curtis: Roy Roberts. Directed by David Alexander.Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Courtship of Floyd Smoot
programme.desc: Kate's intentions are mistaken when she tries to help Floyd Smoot regain his confidence after being slighted by the woman he loves, a bride he had ordered by mail! Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Floyd Smoot: Rafe Davis.Directed by Sherman Marks. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Phony Sheriff
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho get swindled by a fake cattle buyer. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Uncle Disinherits Niece
programme.desc: A rancher is found murdered after he threatens to disinherit his niece. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951 This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E21 Little Britches
programme.desc: Jim Davis stars as Matt Clark, a railroad detective who is investigating a railroad holdup. Starring Mary Castle. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode also features James Best (1926-2015), who would go on to appear on such shows as The Andy Griffith Show, Bonanza, and The Dukes of Hazzard.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E22 Doolin Gang
programme.desc: Detective Matt Clark discovers the hideout of the famous Doolin gang. Clark, along with Detective Frankie, work to infiltrate the hideout and bring the Doolin gang to justice.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White. Directed by William Witney. Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Leo Gordon, Joan Shawlee, Don Kennedy, Kenneth MacDoNald, Patrick Waltz, and Ken Chryson. First aired in 1954.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Border Raiders
programme.desc: In this episode, Mr. Kenyon and his children stumble upon a cache of gunpowder in an abandoned cabin. They take the news to Judge Bean angering Holman who plans on handing the explosives to the hostile Mescaleros. The lawmen must keep it from happening. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Checkmate
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, Doc resorts to drastic measures as he desperately seeks money to fund his free public clinic. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 The Dude Stagecoach
programme.desc: Waiting to hear whether or not gold has been struck in the mine, Annie discovers a beloved stagecoach is being driven by the daughter of the owner, whos threatening to sell the stage so he can pocket the money. When word comes back that there is no gold in the money, Annie becomes suspicious and begins investigating. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Annie Calls Her Shots
programme.desc: After a jailed Dobie escapes from jail, Dobie and Tagg find themselves kidnapped, forcing a desperate Annie to rescue her brother. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 The Servant
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook come across a girl in the woods who is running away from a man named Stark. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 The Search
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help an old woman find her son who has been missing for 18 years.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Savage, The
programme.desc: After Adam gets hurt while saving a woman from a group of indians, the woman must nurse Adam back to health as the rest of the tribe sets out to find her.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: New Mexico
programme.desc: What happens when Abraham Lincoln himself comes to New Mexico to discuss a treaty with Native American chief Acoma (Ted de Corsia)? Can the hotbed of emotions be quieted by cavalry Captain Hunt (Lew Ayres)? Or will the Captains superiors insist on provoking with the native tribe? Find out what happens in this fictional tale packed with action from 1951!

programme.title: Texas Brooklyn and Heaven
programme.desc: When Eddie Tayloe (Guy Madison, 5 Against the House) receives $6,000 from his grandfather, he decides to leave his drab newspaper job and move to New York. His dream is to have a play produced on Broadway. Along the way he picks up a pretty hitchhiker (Diana Lynn, The Miracle of Morgan's Creek) who is also leaving her own dreary life for a shot at New York. Unfortunately, they find that the Big Apple is a hard place to make a living. But it's also a city where circumstances keep bringing them together!

programme.title: Tumbleweeds
programme.desc: The great William S. Hart stars in this classic tale of settlers in the Oklahoma territory. Directed by King Baggot, one of the most versatile movie figures of the silent era, this movie is not only history recorded in heart throbs, as the original print ads boasted, but shows us why Hart is considered by some to be the top western actor of them all. Hart, who directed many of his own films, also had a hand in directing this feature, which turned out to be his last starring role.

programme.title: Rawhide
programme.desc: Baseball superstar Gehrig is one of several ranchers being coerced by a bunch of bandits. His sister and her lawyer/lover organize the ranchers. Directed by Ray Taylor; starring Smith Ballew, Gehrig, Evelyn Knapp. Talk about stunt casting! Gehrig was a New York Yankees star who was nearing the end of his career, but one of the biggest sports stars in the country. In the movie he plays a variation of himself, as Lou Gehrig, a retired baseball player who takes up ranching. Lou expects to relax on his ranch but quickly joins other ranchers in a fight to protect their properties.

programme.title: Blue Steel
programme.desc: Undercover US Marshal John Carruthers (John Wayne) is investigating a rash of robberies by a character known as The Polka Dot Bandit in this B-movie gem. Along the way, Carruthers finds himself in more trouble than he'd ever expected! Written and directed by Robert N. Bradbury, the film features George Gabby Hayes, Eleanor Hunt, and many other favorites of the era. Wayne was only 27 at the time of Blue Steel, but was well on his way to becoming The Duke.

programme.title: Santa Fe Trail
programme.desc: Oscar winner Michael Curtiz (Casablanca, Mildred Pierce) directed this exciting drama about Army officer Jeb Stuart and the days leading up to the Civil War. Errol Flynn (The Adventures of Robin Hood) stars as Stuart, with Olivia de Havilland as his romantic interest (the seventh of nine times they were paired together by Warner Bros.) The cast includes Ronald Reagan as General George Custer, and Raymond Massey as John Brown, with such familiar faces as Alan Hale and Van Hefflin in supporting roles. Filmed partly in Santa Fe!

programme.title: Riders of the Whistling Skull
programme.desc: The Three Mesquiteers appeared in several Republic Pictures during the 1930s, and this is considered one of their best. It's about a mysterious murder at an archeological expedition, which leads the three prairie pals into some dangerous territory. Can they solve the murder without losing their own lives? The cast includes Robert Livingston, Ray Corrigan, Max Terhune, and Roger Williams, all trying to survive a hail of poison arrows and hot lead!

programme.title: The Devil Horse
programme.desc: When a boy is captured by a Native American tribe after his family is massacred, he finds solace in befriending a wild colt. Years later, following his escape, he is recaptured by a tribe who force him to battle their vicious devil horse. Yet, the horse looks familiar. Is this mysterious devil horse and the wild colt he knew years earlier one and the same? Produced by Hal Roach, who wrote the script with an assist from Stan Laurel, this little treasure was the fourth of 15 features to star Rex the Wonder Horse!

programme.title: Bulldog Courage
programme.desc: Tim McCoy, one of the unsung heroes of 1930s western pictures, stars in a dual role. First, hes Slim Braddock, a miner who turns to robbing stagecoaches after being swindled by a banker. When Slim is murdered, his son Tim, also played by McCoy, seeks vengeance. Directed by B-movie legend Sam Newfield for Excelsior Pictures, this film is a showcase for McCoy, who appeared in more than 90 movies and in 1960 earned a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame!

programme.title: Fast Bullets
programme.desc: Tom Tyler stars in this vintage western from the short-lived Reliable Pictures Company, a group known for low budgets and lots of action. In this feature, Tom reforms a gang member in order to infiltrate a ring of thieves. Rex Lease, Margaret Nearing, and Al Bridge also star.

programme.title: Hellgate (Edited Version)
programme.desc: In 1867 Kansas, veterinarian Sterling Hayden treats an injured stranger who turns out to have been a guerrilla raider--and Hayden soon finds himself serving a term in one of the world's most terrifying prisons under sadistic commandant Ward Bond. Adapted from the story of Dr. Mudd, the physician who attended John Wilkes Booth, assassin of President Lincoln.

programme.title: Fugitive of the Plains
programme.desc: In this continuation of the much loved Billy the Kid serials featuring dreamboat Buster Crabbe (perhaps best known for his numerous appearances as Flash Gordon in the 30s and 40s), Billy finds himself joining an outlaw band led by women in order to, once again, clear his name after being wrongly accused of a crime he did not commit. Helmed by famed B-movie director Sam Newfield, this film also features Al St. John, whose lovable Fuzzy character was as essential to the PRC's Billy the Kid series as Billy himself.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E27 The Woman Mayor
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are ordered to Nugget City to tear down a toll-gate on federal land. They are opposed by a woman mayor who uses the gate to keep out riff-raff and raise money for the town's growing needs. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Cowboy G-Men
programme.sub-title: S01 : E28 Double Crossed
programme.desc: Pat and Stoney are sent to Texas when it is discovered that a large number of Federal Gold Bonds held by the State of Texas are counterfeit. Starring Russell Hayden, Jackie Coogan.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Please Buy My Violets
programme.desc: Kate is forced to peddle cologne when Uncle Joe buys a bunch of cases with the money meant for window screens.Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Petticoat Junction
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 The Ringer
programme.desc: Betty Jo must challenge the legendary Pixley Fats in the annual horseshoe tournament. Uncle Joe Carson: Edgar Buchanan. Betty Jo Bradley: Linda Henning. Kate Bradley: Bea Benaderet. Sam Drucker: Frank Cady. Also starring Pat Woodall and Jeannine Riley. Series created by Paul Henning. Episode first aired in 1963.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E26 Water Rights
programme.desc: Cisco and Pancho are falsely accused of robbing a stagecoach. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt, and was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1951. This episode aired in 1951.

programme.title: Cisco Kid
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Boomerang
programme.desc: Two bandits impersonate Cisco and Pancho, sending the two to prison for robbery and murder. Starring Duncan Renaldo as The Cisco Kid, and Leo Carillo as Pancho. This weekly adventure series was a favorite of the 1950s, following two pals as they traveled the old west, righting wrongs and helping the underdog. The show was nominated for a PrimeTime Emmy Award in 1951. It was produced by ZIV Television, the same company that gave us Highway Patrol and Sea Hunt. This episode aired in 1950.

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E23 Black Jack Ketchum
programme.desc: Detectives Matt and Frankie work to save a young man from a hangman's noose in New Mexico.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle, along with Miachael Hall, Mitchell Kowall, and Jean Inness. Directed by William Witney. Episode first aired in 1954.Produced by B movie veteran Edward J. White.Series won an Emmy in 1955. (This episode features the beloved character actor Jack Elam as Black Jack Ketchum.)

programme.title: Stories of the Century
programme.sub-title: S01 : E24 Tom Horn
programme.desc: Matt and Frankie investigate a cattle dispute in Wyoming. When evidence starts to add up, it leads them to Matt's old friend Tom Horn.Starring Jim Davis and Mary Castle. Also sarring Louis Jean Heydt, Harry Woods, Michael Whalen, Stanley Andrews, and Walter Coy. Directed by William Witney. Produced by B movie veteran Edward White. Episode first aired in 1954.Series won an Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Citizen Romeo
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the judge learns of a scheme to smuggle guns and ammo to the Indians, and he encounters an unlikely pair of allies in his plan to break it up: an organ grinder and his monkey. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Judge Roy Bean Collection
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Cross Draw Kid
programme.desc: Judge Roy Bean endeavors to exact justice in the small town of Langtry in the Old West. In this episode, the Judge and Jeff take on the richest man in the valley over water rights. Though the rich villain has ensnared young Hugh in outlaw ways, the lawmen are determined to set Hugh on a better path. Starring Edgar Buchanan, Jack Beutel, and Jackie Laughery.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Valley of the Shadows
programme.desc: Annie tries to help a blind girl find her father's killer. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. Directed by Robert G. Walker. Also starring Judy Nugent, Forrest Taylor, and Denver Pyle. This entertaining western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy Award in 1955.

programme.title: Adventures of Annie Oakley
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Annie and the Lily Maid
programme.desc: Choctaw looks to inherit the ranch of the murdered Sam Forbes, but Elaine, a previously unknown niece, appears, making Annie suspicious as the men fall for her seemingly delicate nature. Annie Oakley: Gail Davis, Deputy Craig: Brad Johnson, Tagg Oakley: Jimmy Hawkins. This western adventure series aired from 1954-1957. Cowboy star Gene Autrey was an executive producer for the show, which was nominated for a Primetime Emmy in 1955.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Snake Tattoo
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook help the long-lost son of a Cree tribal chief.Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingacchook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: The Last of the Mohicans
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 False Witness
programme.desc: Hawkeye and Chingachcook go undercover as managers of a trading post. Hawkeye: John Hart. Chingachcook: Lon Chaney Jr. This syndicated series was filmed in Toronto, and was the final project of prolific Hollywood director Sam Newfeild. Based on characters created by James Fenimore Cooper. Episode originally aired in 1957.

programme.title: Bonanza
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Silent Thunder
programme.desc: Little Joe teaches sign language to a beautiful deaf girl, but finds himself in trouble when the girls neighbor becomes jealous of the attention Little Joe is receiving from the girl.Starring Michael Landon as Joe, Dan Blocker as Hoss, Lorne Green as Ben, and Pernell Roberts as Adam. This beloved western drama ran for 14 seasons on NBC. Created by David Dortort.

programme.title: Prairie Pals
programme.desc: IT'S A MODERN GOLD RUSH GANGSTER STYLE! But Three Ridin' Singin' Fightin' Buckaroos Stop 'Em Cold! The Prairie Pals are on the lookout for Wainwright, a scientist who has gone missing after discovering a way to turn vanadium ore into gold. The Prairie Pals start their search at Hank Stoners land, where the vanadium ore can be found. Directed by Sam Newfield; starring Bill Cowboy Rambler Boyd, Art Davis, and Lee Powell.

programme.title: Sunset Carson Rides Again
programme.desc: Sunset Carson is trying to raise money for a new school and his partner Sam Webster is out to stop him. When Carson plans a benefit prize-fight, Webster plans to make off with the proceeds. Direted by Oliver Drake; starring Sunset Carson, Al Terry, Pat Starling, Ron Ormond, Joe Hiser.

programme.title: The Gay Cavalier
programme.desc: The Cisco Kid, along with Pancho, try to help an unhappy bride.

programme.title: Mohawk
programme.desc: Kurt Neumann (The Fly, Rocketship X-M) directed this bawdy tale of a love that was louder than war drums! With a cast that includes Scott Brady, Rita Gam, and Neville Brand, the story takes place on a remote army post where an artist romances a trio of women, just as a vengeful settler turns the army and the local Iroquois tribe against each other. Film buffs might like to know that the cinematography for this feature is by four-time Oscar nominee Karl Struss, who won an Academy Award in 1929 for his work on Sunrise.

programme.title: Colorado
programme.desc: Theres trouble out west! Its the Civil War and the Union needs troops back east to defend itself. Roy Rogers stars as Lieutenant Jerry Burke, who is sent to investigate why the returning troops are being stalled in Colorado. Also starring Gabby Hayes, Pauline Moore, and Milburn Stone, this film is action packed with a turn you wont see coming!

programme.title: Mały wielki wojownik
programme.desc: Chiny, 227 p.n.e. Liang bierze do niewoli generała, by zdobyć nagrodę, a między nimi rodzi się nieoczekiwana więź.

programme.title: What Men Long For
programme.desc: Karel Král, pewny siebie redaktor naczelny, traci pracę i kłóci się z rodziną. Po szalonej nocy wyraża życzenie, by stać się kobietą – i rano odkrywa, że się spełniło.

programme.title: Niejaki Joe
programme.desc: Kiedy łagodny i dający sobą pomiatać Joe wyzywa biurowego łobuza na pojedynek, zmienia się w gwiazdę.

programme.title: House of the Witch
programme.desc: Grupa licealistów postanawia zrobić psikusa opuszczonemu domowi z okazji Halloween. Po wejściu do środka padają ofiarą demonicznej wiedźmy, która ściąga na nich swój gniew.

programme.title: Lustra
programme.desc: Zdesperowany, aby zjednoczyć swoją rodzinę i poukładać sobie życie Ben Carson podejmuje się pracy jako nocny ochroniarz spalonego domu handlowego w Mayflower.

programme.title: Wyścig z czasem
programme.desc: W przyszłości, gdzie czas to dosłownie pieniądz, a proces starzenia zatrzymuje się w wieku 25 lat, jedyną metodą na utrzymanie się przy życiu jest zarobek, kradzież lub odziedziczenie pieniędzy.

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Szukając sposobu na uratowanie swojego skazanego na zagładę świata, załoga maleńkich, wyglądających jak ludzie kosmitów przybywa na Ziemię w idealnym przebraniu - statku kosmicznym w kształcie zwykłego człowieka.

programme.title: Jumper
programme.desc: Thriller Science Ficition to skok w inny wymiar. JUMPER to opowieść o niezwykłych przygodach człowieka, który odkrywa, że ma ekscytującą zdolność teleportowania się, gdziekolwiek tylko zechce.

programme.title: Klub samotnych mam
programme.desc: Grupa samotnych matek z różnych środowisk łączy się i tworzy grupę wsparcia, gdzie mogą omówić swoje problemy, znaleźć radość w przeszkodach życiowych i wykorzystać swoją wewnętrzną siłę, aby pokonać osobiste wyzwania.

programme.title: Simply Irresistible
programme.desc: Piękna właścicielka restauracji Amanda Shelton (Sarah Michelle Gellar) zakochuje się w przystojnym, ambitnym kierowniku Tomie Bartletcie (Sean Patrick Flanery). Niestety, Tom jest zbyt zajęty, by dostrzec, że spotkał dziewczynę swoich marzeń — dopóki Amanda nie rzuca na niego zaklęcia pokusy!

programme.title: Life or Something Like It
programme.desc: Po przeprowadzeniu wywiadu z bezdomnym jasnowidzem, który mówi jej, że jej życie nie ma sensu i za kilka dni się skończy, reporterka postanawia zmienić swoje postępowanie.

programme.title: What Men Long For
programme.desc: Karel Král, pewny siebie redaktor naczelny, traci pracę i kłóci się z rodziną. Po szalonej nocy wyraża życzenie, by stać się kobietą – i rano odkrywa, że się spełniło.

programme.title: Żądza Śmierci
programme.desc: Były gangster wraca do krwawej profesji, chcąc wziąć odwet na ludziach, którzy skrzywdzili jego bliskich.

programme.title: House of the Witch
programme.desc: Grupa licealistów postanawia zrobić psikusa opuszczonemu domowi z okazji Halloween. Po wejściu do środka padają ofiarą demonicznej wiedźmy, która ściąga na nich swój gniew.

programme.title: Mały wielki wojownik
programme.desc: Chiny, 227 p.n.e. Liang bierze do niewoli generała, by zdobyć nagrodę, a między nimi rodzi się nieoczekiwana więź.

programme.title: If I Were Rich
programme.desc: Tuż przed rozwodem mężczyzna wygrywa 25 milionów euro. Postanawia ukryć ten fakt by nie dzielić się pieniędzmi z żoną.

programme.title: Women on the Run
programme.desc: Matka wraz z 3 córkami pragnie zrealizować ostatnie marzenie niedawno zmarłego ojca. Przygotowują się do przebiegnięcia maratonu.

programme.title: Niejaki Joe
programme.desc: Kiedy łagodny i dający sobą pomiatać Joe wyzywa biurowego łobuza na pojedynek, zmienia się w gwiazdę.

programme.title: Komedia romantyczna
programme.desc: Dziwaczne umysły autorów Strasznego Filmu rozszarpują na strzępy gatunek komedii romantycznej w filmie KOMEDIA ROMANTYCZNA – produkcji dla ludzi, którzy kochają ten gatunek i dla tych, którzy go nienawidzą.

programme.title: U Pana Boga W Ogródku
programme.desc: Do Królowego Mostu trafia najgorszy z absolwentów szkoły policyjnej. Jednocześnie miejscowość ta zostaje wybrana na azyl dla świadka koronnego w procesie mafii.

programme.title: Pushing Tin
programme.desc: Nick Falzone jest kontrolerem ruchu lotniczego numer jeden, dopóki do wydziału nie zostaje przeniesiony tajemniczy nieznajomy, Russell Bell. Rywalizacja pomiędzy dwoma najlepszymi kontrolerami ruchu lotniczego w nowojorskim TRACON-ie eskaluje do potencjalnie niebezpiecznego poziomu.

programme.title: Niepoczytalna
programme.desc: Młoda kobieta opuszcza swoje rodzinne miasto, aby uciec przed niespokojną przeszłością i rozpocząć nową pracę. Kiedy mimowolnie oddaje się instytucji psychiatrycznej, staje przed największym strachem - ale czy to prawda, czy tylko złudzenie?

programme.title: Women on the Run
programme.desc: Matka wraz z 3 córkami pragnie zrealizować ostatnie marzenie niedawno zmarłego ojca. Przygotowują się do przebiegnięcia maratonu.

programme.title: I Can Quit Whenever I Want
programme.desc: Trzech pogrążonych w niełasce nauczycieli akademickich zamienia się w handlarzy narkotyków po tym, jak jeden z nich tworzy nową eksperymentalną pigułkę...

programme.title: Don't Say a Word
programme.desc: Nowojorski psychiatra zostaje zmuszony do terapii niestabilnej pacjentki o burzliwej przeszłości, aby odzyskać wolność dla uprowadzonej córki.

programme.title: Meet Dave
programme.desc: Szukając sposobu na uratowanie swojego skazanego na zagładę świata, załoga maleńkich, wyglądających jak ludzie kosmitów przybywa na Ziemię w idealnym przebraniu - statku kosmicznym w kształcie zwykłego człowieka.

programme.title: Guess Who
programme.desc: Theresa przedstawia rodzicom narzeczonego, Simona Greena, lecz nie ostrzegła ich o jednym drobiazgu: jest biały. Próbując doprowadzić do zerwania, Percy Jones pokazuje, że ojciec nie zawsze ma rację.

programme.title: Wampiry i świry
programme.desc: WAMPIRY I ŚWIRY to komedia o nastoletnich obawach i romansie. Becca jest zaniepokojoną nastolatką, która jest rozdarta pomiędzy dwoma chłopcami.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: I Can Quit Whenever I Want
programme.desc: Trzech pogrążonych w niełasce nauczycieli akademickich zamienia się w handlarzy narkotyków po tym, jak jeden z nich tworzy nową eksperymentalną pigułkę...

programme.title: Przyjaciel do końca świata
programme.desc: Gdy asteroida zbliża się do Ziemi, mężczyzna zostaje sam po tym, jak jego żona odchodzi w panice. Postanawia wyruszyć w podróż, aby spotkać się z ukochaną z liceum. Towarzyszy mu sąsiad, który nieumyślnie utrudnia mu realizację planu.

programme.title: What Men Long For
programme.desc: Karel Král, pewny siebie redaktor naczelny, traci pracę i kłóci się z rodziną. Po szalonej nocy wyraża życzenie, by stać się kobietą – i rano odkrywa, że się spełniło.

programme.title: If I Were Rich
programme.desc: Tuż przed rozwodem mężczyzna wygrywa 25 milionów euro. Postanawia ukryć ten fakt by nie dzielić się pieniędzmi z żoną.

programme.title: Monolit
programme.desc: Podczas wyprawy do Los Angeles matka z synem doznają poważnego wypadku, przez który zmuszeni są walczyć o przetrwanie.

programme.title: Intersections
programme.desc: Małżeństwo spędzające miesiąc miodowy w Maroku przeżywa śmiertelny wypadek samochodowy na środku pustyni.

programme.title: Niepoczytalna
programme.desc: Młoda kobieta opuszcza swoje rodzinne miasto, aby uciec przed niespokojną przeszłością i rozpocząć nową pracę. Kiedy mimowolnie oddaje się instytucji psychiatrycznej, staje przed największym strachem - ale czy to prawda, czy tylko złudzenie?

programme.title: Where's the Money?
programme.desc: W tej skandalicznie śmiesznej komedii Del, sprytny młodzieniec wychowany na ulicach South Central Los Angeles, dowiaduje się, że jego osadzony ojciec wraz z wujkiem, który właśnie wyszedł na wolność (Terry Crews), ukradli milion dolarów i pieniądze ukryli w piwnicy noclegowni.

programme.title: Czas zabijania
programme.desc: Stare nawyki ciężko wykorzenić... Zwłaszcza na zmieniającym się południu USA. Carl Lee Hailey, pracownik fabryki w Mississippi dowiaduje się tego, gdy jego dziesięcioletnia siostra zostaje brutalnie napadnięta przez dwóch pijanych rasistów.

programme.title: Zasady nie obowiązują
programme.desc: Aspitująca młoda aktorka (Lily Collins) oraz jej ambitny młody kierowca (Alden Ehrenreich) zmagają się z absurdalnymi dziwactwami nieprzewidywalnego miliardera Howarda Hughesa (Warren Beatty), dla którego pracują.
